name: charles_c_mann_how_will_we_survive_when_the_population_hits_10_billion
speaker: Charles C. Mann
title: How will we survive when the population hits 10 billion?
transcript:
[{"time": 698, "text": "How are we doing?"}, {"time": 2650, "text": "No, no, no, by that, I meant,"}, {"time": 4239, "text": "how are we, homo sapiens "we" ..."}, {"time": 5944, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 6976, "text": "doing as a species?"}, {"time": 8151, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 9185, "text": "Now the typical way
to answer that question is this."}, {"time": 11660, "text": "You choose some measure
of human physical well-being:"}, {"time": 14809, "text": "average longevity,
average calories per day,"}, {"time": 17531, "text": "average income, overall population,
that sort of thing,"}, {"time": 20197, "text": "and draw a graph of its value over time."}, {"time": 23131, "text": "In almost every case,
you get the same result."}, {"time": 25621, "text": "The line skitters along
at a low level for millennia,"}, {"time": 28336, "text": "then rockets up exponentially
in the 19th and 20th century."}, {"time": 32535, "text": "Or choose a measure of consumption:"}, {"time": 35180, "text": "consumption of energy,
consumption of fresh water,"}, {"time": 37553, "text": "consumption of the world's photosynthesis,"}, {"time": 39648, "text": "and draw a graph of its value over time."}, {"time": 41894, "text": "In the same way, the line skitters along
at a low level for millennia,"}, {"time": 45990, "text": "then rockets up exponentially
in the 19th and 20th century."}, {"time": 50731, "text": "Biologists have a word for this: outbreak."}, {"time": 53894, "text": "An outbreak is when
a population or species"}, {"time": 56531, "text": "exceeds the bounds of natural selection."}, {"time": 58610, "text": "Natural selection ordinarily
keeps populations and species"}, {"time": 61650, "text": "within roughly defined limits."}, {"time": 64130, "text": "Pests, parasites, lack of resources
prevent them from expanding too much."}, {"time": 68365, "text": "But every now and then,
a species escapes its bounds."}, {"time": 72116, "text": "Crown-of-thorns starfish
in the Indian Ocean,"}, {"time": 74532, "text": "zebra mussels in the Great Lakes,
spruce budworm here in Canada."}, {"time": 78136, "text": "Populations explode,
a hundredfold, a thousandfold,"}, {"time": 81303, "text": "a millionfold."}, {"time": 83023, "text": "So here's a fundamental
lesson from biology:"}, {"time": 85589, "text": "outbreaks in nature don't end well."}, {"time": 88126, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 89660, "text": "Put a couple of protozoa
into a petri dish full of nutrient goo."}, {"time": 94276, "text": "In their natural habitat, soil or water,
their environment constrains them."}, {"time": 98896, "text": "In the petri dish, they have
an ocean of breakfast"}, {"time": 101295, "text": "and no natural enemies."}, {"time": 102685, "text": "They eat and reproduce, eat and reproduce,"}, {"time": 105217, "text": "until bang, they hit
the edge of the petri dish,"}, {"time": 107500, "text": "at which point they either
drown in their own waste,"}, {"time": 109959, "text": "starve from lack of resources, or both."}, {"time": 111888, "text": "The outbreak ends, always, badly."}, {"time": 114953, "text": "Now, from the viewpoint of biology,"}, {"time": 117410, "text": "you and I are not fundamentally different
than the protozoa in the petri dish."}, {"time": 121884, "text": "We're not special."}, {"time": 125598, "text": "All the things that we, in our vanity,
think make us different --"}, {"time": 128758, "text": "art, science, technology, and so forth,
they don't matter."}, {"time": 131548, "text": "We're an outbreak species,"}, {"time": 132841, "text": "we're going to hit the edge
of the petri dish, simple as that."}, {"time": 136320, "text": "Well, the obvious question:
Is this actually true?"}, {"time": 139766, "text": "Are we in fact doomed
to hit the edge of the petri dish?"}, {"time": 142457, "text": "I'd like to set aside
this question for a moment"}, {"time": 144750, "text": "and ask you guys another one."}, {"time": 146298, "text": "If we are going to escape biology,
how are we going to do it?"}, {"time": 150242, "text": "In the year 2050,"}, {"time": 151854, "text": "there will be almost
10 billion people in the world,"}, {"time": 154373, "text": "and all of those people will want
the things that you and I want:"}, {"time": 157536, "text": "nice cars, nice clothes, nice homes,"}, {"time": 160837, "text": "the odd chunk of Toblerone."}, {"time": 163064, "text": "I mean, think of it:
Toblerone for 10 billion people."}, {"time": 165579, "text": "How are we going to do this?"}, {"time": 167176, "text": "How are we going to feed everybody,
get water to everybody,"}, {"time": 170040, "text": "provide power to everybody,
avoid the worst impacts of climate change?"}, {"time": 173453, "text": "I'm a science journalist,"}, {"time": 175254, "text": "and I've been asking these questions
to researchers for years,"}, {"time": 178617, "text": "and in my experience, their answers
fall into two broad categories,"}, {"time": 182618, "text": "which I call "wizards" and "prophets.""}, {"time": 184994, "text": "Wizards, techno-whizzes,"}, {"time": 186832, "text": "believe that science and technology,
properly applied,"}, {"time": 189664, "text": "will let us produce
our way out of our dilemmas."}, {"time": 192312, "text": ""Be smart, make more," they say."}, {"time": 194013, "text": ""That way, everyone can win.""}, {"time": 196537, "text": "Prophets believe close to the opposite."}, {"time": 199790, "text": "They see the world as governed
by fundamental ecological processes"}, {"time": 203905, "text": "with limits that we
transgress to our peril."}, {"time": 207206, "text": ""Use less, conserve," they say."}, {"time": 209246, "text": ""Otherwise, everybody's going to lose.""}, {"time": 212261, "text": "Wizards and prophets have been
butting their heads together for decades,"}, {"time": 215713, "text": "but they both believe that technology
is key to a successful future."}, {"time": 219420, "text": "The trouble is, they envision
different types of technology"}, {"time": 222491, "text": "and different types of futures."}, {"time": 224995, "text": "Wizards envision a world of glittering,
hyperefficient megacities"}, {"time": 230152, "text": "surrounded by vast tracts
of untouched nature,"}, {"time": 233138, "text": "economies that have
transitioned from atoms to bits,"}, {"time": 235782, "text": "dematerialized capitalist societies"}, {"time": 237847, "text": "that no longer depend
on exploiting nature."}, {"time": 240755, "text": "Energy, to wizards,
comes from compact nuclear plants;"}, {"time": 243421, "text": "food from low-footprint farms
with ultraproductive,"}, {"time": 246287, "text": "genetically modified crops
tended by robots;"}, {"time": 249119, "text": "water from high-throughput
desalination plants,"}, {"time": 251659, "text": "which means we no longer
exploit rivers and aquifers."}, {"time": 255208, "text": "Wizards envision all 10 billion of us"}, {"time": 257066, "text": "packed into ultradense
but walkable megacities,"}, {"time": 259733, "text": "an urbanized world
of maximum human aspiration"}, {"time": 262431, "text": "and maximum human liberty."}, {"time": 264557, "text": "Now, prophets object to every bit of this."}, {"time": 268089, "text": "You can't dematerialize
food and water, they point out."}, {"time": 271557, "text": "They say, you can't eat bits,"}, {"time": 273717, "text": "and industrial agriculture has already
given us massive soil erosion,"}, {"time": 277265, "text": "huge coastal dead zones
and ruined soil microbiomes."}, {"time": 280210, "text": "And you wizards, you want more of this?"}, {"time": 282181, "text": "And those giant desalination plants?"}, {"time": 284623, "text": "You know they generate
equally giant piles of toxic salt"}, {"time": 287616, "text": "that are basically
impossible to dispose of."}, {"time": 290424, "text": "And those megacities you like?"}, {"time": 292632, "text": "Can you name me
an actually existing megacity"}, {"time": 295721, "text": "that really exists in the world today,
except for possibly Tokyo,"}, {"time": 298969, "text": "that isn't a cesspool
of corruption and inequality?"}, {"time": 303055, "text": "Instead, prophets pray for a world
of smaller, interconnected communities,"}, {"time": 309715, "text": "closer to the earth,"}, {"time": 311905, "text": "a more agrarian world
of maximum human connection"}, {"time": 314946, "text": "and reduced corporate control."}, {"time": 318142, "text": "More people live
in the countryside in this vision,"}, {"time": 320897, "text": "with power provided by neighborhood-scale
solar and wind installations"}, {"time": 324262, "text": "that disappear into the background."}, {"time": 326698, "text": "Prophets don't generate water
from giant desalination plants."}, {"time": 332044, "text": "They capture it from rainfall,"}, {"time": 334576, "text": "and they reuse and recycle it endlessly."}, {"time": 337069, "text": "And the food comes
from small-scale networks of farms"}, {"time": 341513, "text": "that focus on trees and tubers"}, {"time": 343443, "text": "rather than less productive cereals
like wheat and rice."}, {"time": 349286, "text": "Above all, though, prophets envision
people changing their habits."}, {"time": 353009, "text": "They don't drive to work,
they take their renewable-powered train."}, {"time": 356143, "text": "They don't take 30-minute
hot showers every morning."}, {"time": 358674, "text": "They eat, you know,
like Michael Pollan says,"}, {"time": 361159, "text": "real food, mostly plants, not too much."}, {"time": 365825, "text": "Above all, prophets say
submitting to nature's restraints"}, {"time": 369357, "text": "leads to a freer, more democratic,
healthier way of life."}, {"time": 374967, "text": "Now, wizards regard all this as hooey."}, {"time": 377481, "text": "They see it as a recipe for narrowness,
regression, and global poverty."}, {"time": 382314, "text": "Prophet-style agriculture, they say,
only extends the human footprint"}, {"time": 385656, "text": "and shunts more people
into low-wage agricultural labor."}, {"time": 388728, "text": "Those neighborhood-run solar facilities,"}, {"time": 390683, "text": "they sound great,"}, {"time": 392471, "text": "but they depend on a technology
that doesn't exist yet."}, {"time": 395200, "text": "They're a fantasy."}, {"time": 397012, "text": "And recycling water? It's a brake
on growth and development."}, {"time": 399862, "text": "Above all, though, wizards object
to the prophets' emphasis"}, {"time": 403369, "text": "on wide-scale social engineering,"}, {"time": 405431, "text": "which they see as deeply anti-democratic."}, {"time": 409105, "text": "If the history of the last two centuries
was one of unbridled growth,"}, {"time": 413033, "text": "the history of the coming century
may well be the choice we make"}, {"time": 416242, "text": "as a species between these two paths."}, {"time": 419021, "text": "These are the arguments that will be
resolved, in one way or another,"}, {"time": 422942, "text": "by our children's generation,"}, {"time": 424430, "text": "the generation that will come
into the world of 10 billion."}, {"time": 427270, "text": "Now, but wait, by this point,
biologists should be rolling their eyes"}, {"time": 430556, "text": "so loud you can barely hear me speak."}, {"time": 432466, "text": "They should be saying,
all of this, wizards, prophets,"}, {"time": 436187, "text": "it's a pipe dream."}, {"time": 437563, "text": "It doesn't matter which illusory path
you think you're taking."}, {"time": 442736, "text": "Outbreaks in nature don't end well."}, {"time": 445196, "text": "I mean, you think the protozoa
see the edge of the petri dish approaching"}, {"time": 448696, "text": "and say, "Hey guys,
time to change society"?"}, {"time": 450815, "text": "No. They just let her rip."}, {"time": 452997, "text": "That's what life does,
and we're part of life."}, {"time": 455552, "text": "We'll do the same thing. Deal with it."}, {"time": 458242, "text": "Well, if you're a follower of Darwin,
you have to take this into consideration."}, {"time": 464500, "text": "I mean, the basic counterargument
boils down to: "We're special.""}, {"time": 468762, "text": "How lame is that?"}, {"time": 470045, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 471560, "text": "I mean, we can accumulate
and share knowledge"}, {"time": 473704, "text": "and use it to guide our future."}, {"time": 475552, "text": "Well, are we actually doing this?"}, {"time": 477300, "text": "Is there any evidence that we're actually
using our accumulated, shared knowledge"}, {"time": 483514, "text": "to guarantee our long-term prosperity?"}, {"time": 486093, "text": "It's pretty easy to say no."}, {"time": 488398, "text": "If you're a wizard,"}, {"time": 489321, "text": "and you believe that hyperproductive,
genetically engineered crops"}, {"time": 492783, "text": "are key to feeding everyone
in tomorrow's world,"}, {"time": 495170, "text": "you have to worry that 20 years"}, {"time": 497979, "text": "of scientists demonstrating
that they are safe to consume"}, {"time": 500725, "text": "has failed to convince the public
to embrace this technology."}, {"time": 503655, "text": "If you're a prophet"}, {"time": 504993, "text": "and you believe that key to solving
today's growing shortage of fresh water"}, {"time": 509494, "text": "is to stop wasting it,"}, {"time": 511469, "text": "you have to worry
that cities around the world,"}, {"time": 514390, "text": "in rich places as well as poor,"}, {"time": 516214, "text": "routinely lose a quarter
or more of their water"}, {"time": 518825, "text": "to leaky and contaminated pipes."}, {"time": 521515, "text": "I mean, Cape Town, just a little
while ago, almost ran out of water."}, {"time": 525068, "text": "Cape Town loses a third
of its water to leaky pipes."}, {"time": 527659, "text": "This problem has been
getting worse for decades,"}, {"time": 530000, "text": "and remarkably little
has been done about it."}, {"time": 532619, "text": "If you're a wizard, and you think
that clean, abundant,"}, {"time": 535892, "text": "carbon-free nuclear power
is key to fighting climate change,"}, {"time": 538785, "text": "then you have to worry"}, {"time": 540050, "text": "that the public willingness
to build nukes is going down."}, {"time": 543455, "text": "If you're a prophet, and you think
that the solution to the same problem"}, {"time": 546915, "text": "is these neighborhood-run solar facilities
shuttling power back and forth,"}, {"time": 550517, "text": "you have to worry that no nation
anywhere in the world"}, {"time": 553295, "text": "has devoted anything like the resources
necessary to develop this technology"}, {"time": 557288, "text": "and deploy it in the time that we need it."}, {"time": 559815, "text": "And if you're on either side,
wizard or prophet,"}, {"time": 562177, "text": "you have to worry that, despite
the massive alarm about climate change,"}, {"time": 566749, "text": "the amount of energy generated every year
from fossil fuels has gone up"}, {"time": 570726, "text": "by about 30 percent
since the beginning of this century."}, {"time": 574443, "text": "So, still think we're different
than the protozoa?"}, {"time": 578498, "text": "Still think we're special?"}, {"time": 582392, "text": "Actually, it's even worse than that."}, {"time": 584979, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 587591, "text": "We're not in the streets."}, {"time": 588866, "text": "No seriously, if there's a difference
between us and the protozoa,"}, {"time": 592065, "text": "a difference that matters,"}, {"time": 593631, "text": "it's not just our art and science
and technology and so forth --"}, {"time": 596732, "text": "it's that we can yell and scream,
we can go out into the streets,"}, {"time": 599987, "text": "and, over time,
change the way society works,"}, {"time": 602129, "text": "but we're not doing it."}, {"time": 603407, "text": "Wizards have been arguing
literally for decades"}, {"time": 605855, "text": "that nuclear power is key
to resolving climate change."}, {"time": 612174, "text": "But the first pro-nuke march in history
occurred less than two years ago,"}, {"time": 616427, "text": "and it was dwarfed by the anti-nuke
marches of the past."}, {"time": 619713, "text": "Prophets have been arguing,
again literally for decades,"}, {"time": 622863, "text": "that conservation is key
to keeping freshwater supplies"}, {"time": 626650, "text": "without destroying the ecosystems
that generate those freshwater supplies."}, {"time": 630509, "text": "But in the history of humankind,
there has never been a street"}, {"time": 633444, "text": "full of angry protesters
waving signs about leaky pipes."}, {"time": 636985, "text": "In fact, most of the political
activity in this sphere"}, {"time": 640607, "text": "has been wizards and prophets
fighting each other, protesting each other"}, {"time": 644122, "text": "rather than recognizing that they are,
fundamentally, on the same side."}, {"time": 647884, "text": "After all, these people are concerned
about the same thing:"}, {"time": 651315, "text": "How are we going to make our way
in the world of 10 billion?"}, {"time": 654936, "text": "The first step towards generating
that necessary social movement,"}, {"time": 658094, "text": "creating that critical mass and getting
that yelling and screaming going"}, {"time": 661562, "text": "seems obvious:
wizards and prophets join together."}, {"time": 663947, "text": "But how are you going to do this,
given the decades of hostility?"}, {"time": 667121, "text": "One way might be this:"}, {"time": 668319, "text": "Each side agrees to accept
the fundamental premises of the other."}, {"time": 673837, "text": "Accept that nuclear power
is safe and carbon-free,"}, {"time": 677258, "text": "and that uranium mines
can be hideously dirty"}, {"time": 679829, "text": "and that putting large volumes
of toxic waste on rickety trains"}, {"time": 684178, "text": "and shuttling them around
the countryside is a terrible idea."}, {"time": 688122, "text": "To me, this leads rather quickly
to a vision of small,"}, {"time": 691679, "text": "neighborhood scale, temporary nukes,"}, {"time": 694371, "text": "nuclear power as a bridge technology
while we develop and deploy renewables."}, {"time": 698015, "text": "Or accept that genetically
modified crops are safe"}, {"time": 701740, "text": "and that industrial agriculture
has caused huge environmental problems."}, {"time": 705455, "text": "To me, this leads rather quickly
to a vision of plant scientists"}, {"time": 709729, "text": "devoting much more of their attention
to tree and tuber crops,"}, {"time": 712900, "text": "which can be much more
productive than cereals,"}, {"time": 715932, "text": "use much less water than cereals,
and cause much less erosion than cereals."}, {"time": 719717, "text": "These are just ideas
from a random journalist."}, {"time": 721928, "text": "I'm sure there's a hundred better ones
right here in this room."}, {"time": 725006, "text": "The main point is,"}, {"time": 726181, "text": "wizards and prophets working together
have many paths to success."}, {"time": 730204, "text": "And success would mean
much more than mere survival,"}, {"time": 732900, "text": "important though that is."}, {"time": 734175, "text": "I mean, if humankind somehow
survives its own outbreak,"}, {"time": 737184, "text": "if we get food to everybody,
get water to everybody,"}, {"time": 739650, "text": "get power to everybody,"}, {"time": 740831, "text": "if we avoid the worst effects
of climate change,"}, {"time": 744952, "text": "if we somehow safeguard the biome,"}, {"time": 747035, "text": "it would be amazing."}, {"time": 749405, "text": "It would say, I think,"}, {"time": 751210, "text": "even to a hardened cynic like me,"}, {"time": 753393, "text": "maybe we really are special."}, {"time": 755615, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 756790, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: darieth_chisolm_let_s_call_revenge_porn_what_it_is_digital_domestic_violence
speaker: Darieth Chisolm
title: How revenge porn turns lives upside down
transcript:
[{"time": 929, "text": "I had about five minutes
before I was set to deliver a talk"}, {"time": 4190, "text": "to a bunch of business owners"}, {"time": 5617, "text": "about visibility and being on camera."}, {"time": 8365, "text": "After all, I was
the so-called expert there,"}, {"time": 11276, "text": "the former 20-year television news anchor
and life and business coach."}, {"time": 16957, "text": "I happened to take a look down
at my cell phone just to catch the time,"}, {"time": 20350, "text": "and I noticed that I had a missed call
from my ex-husband."}, {"time": 24585, "text": "I can still hear his voice."}, {"time": 27553, "text": ""Darieth, what is going on?"}, {"time": 31128, "text": "I just got a call from some strange man
who told me to go to this website,"}, {"time": 35842, "text": "and now I'm looking at
all of these photos of you naked."}, {"time": 40010, "text": "Your private parts
are all over this website."}, {"time": 43241, "text": "Who's seen this?""}, {"time": 46479, "text": "I couldn't think. I couldn't breathe."}, {"time": 50223, "text": "I was so humiliated
and so embarrassed and so ashamed."}, {"time": 54211, "text": "I felt like my world was coming to an end."}, {"time": 57196, "text": "And yet, this began for me
months of pain and depression"}, {"time": 61704, "text": "and anger and confusion and silence."}, {"time": 64992, "text": "My manipulative, jealous,
stalker ex-boyfriend"}, {"time": 69470, "text": "did exactly what he said he would do:"}, {"time": 71628, "text": "he put up a website with my name on it,"}, {"time": 74288, "text": "and he posted this."}, {"time": 77167, "text": "And this."}, {"time": 79317, "text": "And several explicit photos"}, {"time": 81395, "text": "that he had taken of me
while I was asleep,"}, {"time": 83787, "text": "living with him in Jamaica."}, {"time": 85768, "text": "For months prior to that,
he had been sending me"}, {"time": 88109, "text": "threatening text messages like this."}, {"time": 90553, "text": "He was trying to make me out to be
some sleazy, low-life slut."}, {"time": 95618, "text": "He had even threatened to kill me."}, {"time": 97341, "text": "He told me that he would shoot me
in my head and stab me in my heart,"}, {"time": 102308, "text": "simply because I wanted to end
the controlling relationship."}, {"time": 106977, "text": "I couldn't believe
this was happening to me."}, {"time": 109890, "text": "I didn't even know what to call it."}, {"time": 111803, "text": "You might know it as
cyberharassment or cyberbullying."}, {"time": 115768, "text": "The media calls it "revenge porn.""}, {"time": 118625, "text": "I now call it "digital domestic violence.""}, {"time": 122387, "text": "It typically stems from
a relationship gone bad,"}, {"time": 125528, "text": "where a controlling, jilted ex-lover
can't handle rejection,"}, {"time": 129657, "text": "so when they can't physically
put their hands on you,"}, {"time": 132411, "text": "they use different weapons:
cell phones and laptops."}, {"time": 136212, "text": "The ammunition?"}, {"time": 137395, "text": "Photos, videos, explicit information,
content -- all posted online,"}, {"time": 143058, "text": "without your consent."}, {"time": 145082, "text": "I mean, let's face it --
we all live our lives online."}, {"time": 148347, "text": "And the internet is a really small world."}, {"time": 151125, "text": "We show off our baby photos,"}, {"time": 153014, "text": "we start and grow our businesses,
we make new relationships,"}, {"time": 155871, "text": "we let the world in,
one Facebook like at a time."}, {"time": 161323, "text": "And you know what I found?"}, {"time": 162863, "text": "An even smaller world."}, {"time": 164728, "text": "One in 25 women say
they have been impacted by revenge porn."}, {"time": 169395, "text": "For women under the age of 30,
that number looks like one in 10."}, {"time": 174186, "text": "And that leaves a few of you
in this audience as potential victims."}, {"time": 178630, "text": "You want to know
what's even more alarming?"}, {"time": 180757, "text": "Lack of legislation and laws
to adequately protect victims"}, {"time": 184779, "text": "and punish perpetrators."}, {"time": 186363, "text": "There's only one federal bill pending;"}, {"time": 188760, "text": "it's called the ENOUGH Act,
by Senator Kamala Harris."}, {"time": 192712, "text": "It would criminalize revenge porn."}, {"time": 195441, "text": "But that could take years to pass."}, {"time": 197640, "text": "So what are we left with in the meantime?"}, {"time": 199694, "text": "Flimsy civil misdemeanors."}, {"time": 201648, "text": "Currently, only 40 states and DC
have some laws in place for revenge porn."}, {"time": 208156, "text": "And those penalties vary --
we're talking $500 fines."}, {"time": 212061, "text": "Five hundred dollars?"}, {"time": 213288, "text": "Are you kidding me?"}, {"time": 214465, "text": "Women are losing their jobs."}, {"time": 215845, "text": "They're suffering
from damaged relationships"}, {"time": 218176, "text": "and damaged reputations."}, {"time": 219561, "text": "They're falling into illness
and depression."}, {"time": 222125, "text": "And the suicide rates are climbing."}, {"time": 225802, "text": "You're looking at a woman
who spent 11 months in court,"}, {"time": 230016, "text": "thirteen trips to the courthouse"}, {"time": 232167, "text": "and thousands of dollars in legal fees,"}, {"time": 234657, "text": "just to get two things:"}, {"time": 236315, "text": "a protection from cyberstalking
and cyberabuse,"}, {"time": 239236, "text": "otherwise known as a PFA,"}, {"time": 241736, "text": "and language from a judge"}, {"time": 243002, "text": "that would force a third-party
internet company"}, {"time": 245284, "text": "to remove the content."}, {"time": 247815, "text": "It's expensive, complicated and confusing."}, {"time": 251024, "text": "And worse, legal loopholes
and jurisdictional issues drag this out"}, {"time": 256494, "text": "for months,"}, {"time": 257802, "text": "while my private parts
were on display for months."}, {"time": 262203, "text": "How would you feel if your naked body
was exposed for the world to see,"}, {"time": 266259, "text": "and you waited helplessly
for the content to be removed?"}, {"time": 270966, "text": "Eventually, I stumbled upon
a private company"}, {"time": 273657, "text": "to issue a DMCA notice
to shut the website down."}, {"time": 277434, "text": "DMCA -- Digital Millennium Copyright Act."}, {"time": 281154, "text": "It's a law that regulates
digital material and content."}, {"time": 284582, "text": "Broadly, the aim of the DMCA is to protect
both copyright owners and consumers."}, {"time": 289654, "text": "So get this:"}, {"time": 290840, "text": "people who take and share nude photos
own the rights to those selfies,"}, {"time": 295900, "text": "so they should be able to issue a DMCA
to have the content removed."}, {"time": 300876, "text": "But not so fast --"}, {"time": 302237, "text": "because the other fight we're dealing with"}, {"time": 304673, "text": "is noncompliant and nonresponsive
third-party internet companies."}, {"time": 309030, "text": "And oh -- by the way,"}, {"time": 310756, "text": "even in consenting relationships,"}, {"time": 312903, "text": "just because you get
a nude photo or a naked pic,"}, {"time": 316276, "text": "does not give you the right to share it,"}, {"time": 319053, "text": "even [without] the intent to do harm."}, {"time": 322157, "text": "Back to my case,"}, {"time": 323806, "text": "which happens to be further complicated"}, {"time": 325783, "text": "because he was stalking and harassing me
from another country,"}, {"time": 328974, "text": "making it nearly impossible
to get help here."}, {"time": 333441, "text": "But wait a minute --
isn't the internet international?"}, {"time": 336458, "text": "Shouldn't we have
some sort of policy in place"}, {"time": 338950, "text": "that broadly protects us,
regardless to borders or restrictions?"}, {"time": 343800, "text": "I just couldn’t give up;
I had to keep fighting."}, {"time": 347149, "text": "So I willingly, on three occasions,"}, {"time": 350760, "text": "allowed for the invasion
of both my cell phone and my laptop"}, {"time": 355323, "text": "by the Department of Homeland Security
and the Jamaican Embassy"}, {"time": 359307, "text": "for thorough forensic investigation,"}, {"time": 361553, "text": "because I had maintained
all of the evidence."}, {"time": 365680, "text": "I painstakingly shared my private parts
with the all-male investigative team."}, {"time": 371735, "text": "And it was an embarrassing, humiliating
additional hoop to jump through."}, {"time": 377315, "text": "But then something happened."}, {"time": 379982, "text": "Jamaican authorities
actually arrested him."}, {"time": 383562, "text": "He's now facing charges
under their malicious communications act,"}, {"time": 388424, "text": "and if found guilty, could face
thousands of dollars in fines"}, {"time": 392741, "text": "and up to 10 years in prison."}, {"time": 394677, "text": "And I've also learned that my case
is making history --"}, {"time": 397300, "text": "it is the first international case
under this new crime."}, {"time": 402595, "text": "Wow, finally some justice."}, {"time": 406273, "text": "But this got me to thinking."}, {"time": 408376, "text": "Nobody deserves this."}, {"time": 410474, "text": "Nobody deserves this level of humiliation"}, {"time": 414085, "text": "and having to jump through
all of these hoops."}, {"time": 418506, "text": "Our cyber civil rights are at stake."}, {"time": 422331, "text": "Here in the United States,
we need to have clear, tough enforcement;"}, {"time": 427227, "text": "we need to demand the accountability
and responsiveness from online companies;"}, {"time": 432107, "text": "we need to promote social responsibilities
for posting, sharing and texting;"}, {"time": 436797, "text": "and we need to restore dignity to victims."}, {"time": 441506, "text": "And what about victims"}, {"time": 444210, "text": "who neither have the time,
money or resources to wage war,"}, {"time": 447696, "text": "who are left disempowered,
mislabeled and broken?"}, {"time": 452362, "text": "Two things:"}, {"time": 454805, "text": "release the shame and end the silence."}, {"time": 458212, "text": "Shame is at the core of all of this."}, {"time": 461474, "text": "And for every silent prisoner of shame,"}, {"time": 464927, "text": "it's the fear of judgment
that's holding you hostage."}, {"time": 468030, "text": "And the price to pay
is the stripping away of your self-worth."}, {"time": 473045, "text": "The day I ended my silence,
I freed myself from shame."}, {"time": 477593, "text": "And I freed myself
from the fear of judgment"}, {"time": 480800, "text": "from the one person who I thought
would judge me the most --"}, {"time": 484109, "text": "my son,"}, {"time": 485847, "text": "who actually told me,"}, {"time": 487863, "text": ""Mom, you are the strongest
person that I know."}, {"time": 492117, "text": "You can get through this."}, {"time": 494427, "text": "And besides, mom -- he chose
the wrong woman to mess with.""}, {"time": 499188, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 500928, "text": "(Applause)"}, {"time": 505568, "text": "It was on that day that I decided
to use my platform"}, {"time": 509286, "text": "and my story and my voice."}, {"time": 512633, "text": "And to get started, I asked myself
this one simple question:"}, {"time": 516054, "text": "Who do I need to become now?"}, {"time": 518784, "text": "That question, in the face of everything
that I was challenged with,"}, {"time": 522919, "text": "transformed my life and had me thinking
about all kinds of possibilities."}, {"time": 527196, "text": "I now own my story, I speak my truth,"}, {"time": 530482, "text": "and I'm narrating
a new chapter in my life."}, {"time": 533109, "text": "It's called "50 Shades of Silence.""}, {"time": 536712, "text": "It's a global social justice project,"}, {"time": 539315, "text": "and we're working to film
an upcoming documentary"}, {"time": 541673, "text": "to give voice and dignity to victims."}, {"time": 544871, "text": "If you are a victim or you know
someone who is, know this:"}, {"time": 549101, "text": "in order to be empowered,
you have to take care of yourself,"}, {"time": 552649, "text": "and you have to love yourself."}, {"time": 554379, "text": "You have to turn your anger into action,"}, {"time": 557141, "text": "your pain into power"}, {"time": 558728, "text": "and your setback into a setup
for what's next for your life."}, {"time": 564309, "text": "This is a process, and it's a journey
of self-discovery"}, {"time": 568071, "text": "that might include forgiveness."}, {"time": 570397, "text": "But it definitely requires bravery,
confidence and conviction."}, {"time": 576136, "text": "I call it:"}, {"time": 577644, "text": "finding your everyday courage."}, {"time": 582048, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 583231, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: henrietta_fore_how_we_can_help_young_people_build_a_better_future
speaker: Henrietta Fore
title: How we can help young people build a better future
transcript:
[{"time": 1560, "text": "Today, there are 1.8 billion young people"}, {"time": 6280, "text": "between the ages
of 10 and 24 in the world."}, {"time": 10920, "text": "It is the largest cohort in human history."}, {"time": 14680, "text": "Meeting their needs
will be a big challenge."}, {"time": 17640, "text": "But it's also a big opportunity."}, {"time": 20800, "text": "They hold our shared future
in their hands."}, {"time": 25360, "text": "Every day, we read about young people
lending their ideas and passions"}, {"time": 31200, "text": "to fighting for change,"}, {"time": 33240, "text": "social change, political change,
change in their communities."}, {"time": 38520, "text": "Imagine what they'll create:
breakthroughs, inventions."}, {"time": 43480, "text": "Maybe new medicines,
new modes of transportation,"}, {"time": 47720, "text": "new ways to communicate,"}, {"time": 49760, "text": "sustainable economies
and maybe even a world at peace."}, {"time": 55320, "text": "But this opportunity, this youth dividend,"}, {"time": 58240, "text": "is not a given."}, {"time": 61200, "text": "One point eight billion
young women and young men"}, {"time": 65120, "text": "are standing at the door of adulthood."}, {"time": 68520, "text": "Are they ready?"}, {"time": 70280, "text": "Right now, too few of them are."}, {"time": 73520, "text": "My favorite part of my job at UNICEF"}, {"time": 76160, "text": "is a chance to talk to, meet with
and hear from young people"}, {"time": 80720, "text": "all around the world."}, {"time": 82680, "text": "And they tell me
about their hopes and dreams."}, {"time": 85600, "text": "And they have amazing hopes and dreams"}, {"time": 88680, "text": "for what they'll accomplish
in their lives."}, {"time": 91960, "text": "But what they're also telling me
is that they have fears."}, {"time": 96400, "text": "They feel that they're facing
a series of urgent crises."}, {"time": 101360, "text": "A crisis of demographics,"}, {"time": 103960, "text": "a crisis of education,"}, {"time": 106360, "text": "a crisis of employment,"}, {"time": 108640, "text": "a crisis of violence"}, {"time": 110720, "text": "and a crisis for girls."}, {"time": 115240, "text": "If you look at these crises,
you realize that they're urgent"}, {"time": 119640, "text": "and they need to be addressed now."}, {"time": 122080, "text": "Because they tell us that they're worried."}, {"time": 125560, "text": "They're worried that they might not get
the education that they need."}, {"time": 130280, "text": "And you know what?"}, {"time": 131520, "text": "They're right."}, {"time": 133120, "text": "Two hundred million adolescents
are out of school worldwide,"}, {"time": 136960, "text": "about the population of Brazil."}, {"time": 139640, "text": "And those that are in school"}, {"time": 141640, "text": "feel that they may not be getting
the right skills."}, {"time": 145080, "text": "Globally, six in 10
children and young people"}, {"time": 149400, "text": "do not meet the minimum proficiency level
for reading and mathematics."}, {"time": 155360, "text": "No country can be successful"}, {"time": 157880, "text": "if nearly half of its population
of young people"}, {"time": 161320, "text": "are unable to read or write."}, {"time": 164680, "text": "And what about the lucky few
who are in secondary school?"}, {"time": 168880, "text": "Many of them are dropping out
because they're worried"}, {"time": 172080, "text": "that they're not getting skills
that they can use to make a livelihood."}, {"time": 176280, "text": "And sometimes, their parents
can no longer afford the fees."}, {"time": 180240, "text": "It's a tragedy."}, {"time": 182480, "text": "And young people are also telling me
that they're worried about employment,"}, {"time": 187360, "text": "that they won't be able to find a job."}, {"time": 190120, "text": "And again, they're right."}, {"time": 192480, "text": "Every month, 10 million
young people reach working age."}, {"time": 197760, "text": "It's a staggering number."}, {"time": 199920, "text": "Some will go on for further education,
but many will enter the workforce."}, {"time": 205160, "text": "And our world is not creating
10 million new jobs each month."}, {"time": 210400, "text": "The competition is fierce
for the jobs that are available."}, {"time": 215000, "text": "So, imagine being a young person today,"}, {"time": 217920, "text": "needing a job, seeking a livelihood,"}, {"time": 221160, "text": "ready to build a future,"}, {"time": 223240, "text": "and opportunities are hard to find."}, {"time": 228120, "text": "Young people are also telling me"}, {"time": 230120, "text": "that they're worried that they're not
getting the skills that they need."}, {"time": 233880, "text": "And again, they're right."}, {"time": 237840, "text": "We are finding ourselves
at a time in the world"}, {"time": 242240, "text": "when the world
is changing so fast for work."}, {"time": 245240, "text": "We're in the fourth industrial revolution."}, {"time": 248640, "text": "Young people do not want to be
on the farms and in rural communities."}, {"time": 252840, "text": "They want to go to the cities."}, {"time": 254880, "text": "They want to learn future skills
for future work."}, {"time": 258880, "text": "They want to learn digital technology
and green technologies."}, {"time": 263160, "text": "They want to have a chance
to learn modern agriculture."}, {"time": 266800, "text": "They want to learn business
and entrepreneurship,"}, {"time": 269560, "text": "so that they can create
a business of their own."}, {"time": 272640, "text": "They want to be nurses and radiologists
and pharmacists and doctors."}, {"time": 278200, "text": "And they want to have all of the skills
that they'll need for the future."}, {"time": 282960, "text": "They also want to learn the trades,
like construction and electricians."}, {"time": 288480, "text": "These are all the professions
that a country needs,"}, {"time": 291480, "text": "as well as the professions
that have not been invented yet."}, {"time": 296080, "text": "And young people are also telling me
that they're worried about violence."}, {"time": 301720, "text": "At home, online, in school,
in their communities."}, {"time": 306680, "text": "And again, they're right."}, {"time": 309560, "text": "A young person can have
hundreds of friends on social media,"}, {"time": 313880, "text": "but when they need
to find a friendly face,"}, {"time": 316880, "text": "someone who can be there
as their friend, to talk to,"}, {"time": 319960, "text": "they do not find one."}, {"time": 322200, "text": "They face bullying, harassment and more."}, {"time": 326240, "text": "And hundreds of millions
are facing exploitation"}, {"time": 330280, "text": "and abuse, and violence."}, {"time": 333360, "text": "Every seven minutes,
an adolescent boy or girl"}, {"time": 337400, "text": "somewhere in the world
is killed by an act of violence."}, {"time": 343400, "text": "And girls are telling me"}, {"time": 344800, "text": "that they're especially worried
about their futures."}, {"time": 348120, "text": "And sadly, they're right, too."}, {"time": 350800, "text": "Girls face prejudice and discrimination."}, {"time": 353880, "text": "They face early childhood marriage"}, {"time": 355920, "text": "and they face life-threatening
early pregnancy."}, {"time": 360760, "text": "Imagine a population of the United States."}, {"time": 363600, "text": "Now double it."}, {"time": 365080, "text": "That's the number of women who
were married before their 18th birthday."}, {"time": 369880, "text": "Six hundred and fifty million."}, {"time": 372640, "text": "And many were mothers
while they were still children themselves."}, {"time": 378000, "text": "One out of every three women
will face physical abuse"}, {"time": 382560, "text": "or sexual abuse in her lifetime."}, {"time": 385920, "text": "So, no wonder girls are worried
about their futures."}, {"time": 390400, "text": "These urgent crises may not be a reality
in your life or in your neighborhood."}, {"time": 395960, "text": "And perhaps you've had opportunities
for a good education"}, {"time": 398920, "text": "and for marketable skills,
and for getting a job."}, {"time": 402560, "text": "And maybe you've never faced violence,
or prejudice, or discrimination."}, {"time": 407680, "text": "But there are tens of millions
of young people who are not so lucky."}, {"time": 412040, "text": "And they are sounding the alarm
for their futures."}, {"time": 416520, "text": "And that is why UNICEF
and our many public and private partners"}, {"time": 420600, "text": "are launching a new global initiative."}, {"time": 423600, "text": "Young people themselves have named it."}, {"time": 426640, "text": "And it's called Generation Unlimited"}, {"time": 429600, "text": "or Gen-U or Gen you."}, {"time": 434720, "text": "So, what they're saying is,
it's our time, it's our turn,"}, {"time": 439480, "text": "it's our future."}, {"time": 441760, "text": "Our goal is very straightforward."}, {"time": 444720, "text": "We want every young person
in school, learning, training,"}, {"time": 449600, "text": "or age-appropriate employment
by the year 2030."}, {"time": 454880, "text": "This goal is urgent,
it's necessary, it's ambitious."}, {"time": 459280, "text": "But we think it's also achievable."}, {"time": 462480, "text": "So we're calling out
for cutting-edge solutions"}, {"time": 465240, "text": "and new ideas."}, {"time": 467120, "text": "Ideas that will give young people
a fighting chance for their futures."}, {"time": 472080, "text": "We don't know all the answers,"}, {"time": 473840, "text": "so we're reaching out to businesses
and governments, and nonprofits,"}, {"time": 478240, "text": "and academia, and communities,
and innovators for help."}, {"time": 482880, "text": "Gen-U is to be an open platform,"}, {"time": 485720, "text": "where people can come
and share their ideas and solutions"}, {"time": 490800, "text": "about what works, what does not work,"}, {"time": 493960, "text": "and importantly, what might work."}, {"time": 498040, "text": "So if we can take these ideas
and add a little bit of seed money,"}, {"time": 503080, "text": "and add some good partners,"}, {"time": 505080, "text": "and add good political will,"}, {"time": 507360, "text": "we think they can scale up to reach
thousands and millions of people"}, {"time": 511600, "text": "around the world."}, {"time": 513720, "text": "And with this project,
we're also going to do something new."}, {"time": 517240, "text": "We're going to co-design
and co-create with young people."}, {"time": 520880, "text": "So with Gen-U, they're going to be
in the driver's seat,"}, {"time": 523799, "text": "steering us all along the way."}, {"time": 527280, "text": "In Argentina, there's a program
where we connect students"}, {"time": 531440, "text": "who are in rural, remote,
hard to reach mountainous communities,"}, {"time": 536520, "text": "with something they've seldom seen:"}, {"time": 539160, "text": "a secondary school teacher."}, {"time": 541680, "text": "So these students come to a classroom,
they're joined by a community teacher"}, {"time": 547320, "text": "and they're connected
to urban schools online."}, {"time": 551560, "text": "And there is the secondary school teacher,"}, {"time": 554400, "text": "who is teaching them
about digital technology"}, {"time": 557800, "text": "and a good secondary school education,"}, {"time": 560680, "text": "without them ever having to leave
their own communities."}, {"time": 565000, "text": "And in South Africa,
there's a program called Techno Girls."}, {"time": 569200, "text": "And these are girls
from disadvantaged neighborhoods"}, {"time": 571920, "text": "who are studying the STEM program area:"}, {"time": 575240, "text": "science, technology, engineering and math."}, {"time": 578400, "text": "And they have a chance to job shadow."}, {"time": 581400, "text": "This is the way that they then
can see themselves"}, {"time": 584000, "text": "in jobs that are in engineering,"}, {"time": 586040, "text": "in science, and maybe
in the space program."}, {"time": 590320, "text": "In Bangladesh,"}, {"time": 591680, "text": "we have partners who are training
tens of thousands of young people"}, {"time": 595720, "text": "in the trades,"}, {"time": 597040, "text": "so that they can become
motorcycle repair people,"}, {"time": 600280, "text": "or mobile phone service people."}, {"time": 602760, "text": "But these are a chance to see
their own livelihoods."}, {"time": 606120, "text": "And maybe even to have
a business of their own."}, {"time": 610400, "text": "And in Vietnam,"}, {"time": 612040, "text": "there's a program where
we are pairing young entrepreneurs"}, {"time": 615880, "text": "with the needs in their own
local communities."}, {"time": 618920, "text": "So with this program, a group gathered"}, {"time": 621880, "text": "and they decided that they would
solve the problem of transportation"}, {"time": 625800, "text": "for people with disabilities
in their communities."}, {"time": 629120, "text": "So with a mentor
and a bit of seed funding,"}, {"time": 631440, "text": "they've now developed a new app
to help the whole community."}, {"time": 636280, "text": "And I've seen how these programs
can make a difference."}, {"time": 640440, "text": "When I was in Lebanon,
I visited a program called Girls Got IT,"}, {"time": 644960, "text": "or Girls Got It."}, {"time": 647520, "text": "And in this program,
girls who have been studying"}, {"time": 650600, "text": "computer skills and the STEM program"}, {"time": 653440, "text": "have a chance to work side by side
with young professionals,"}, {"time": 657720, "text": "so that they can learn firsthand"}, {"time": 660600, "text": "what it's like to be an architect,
a designer or a scientist."}, {"time": 665280, "text": "And when you see these girls,
smiles on their faces,"}, {"time": 668520, "text": "the hot lights in their eyes,"}, {"time": 671240, "text": "they are so excited,
they have hope for the future."}, {"time": 674840, "text": "They want to change the world."}, {"time": 677080, "text": "And now, with this program
and these mentors,"}, {"time": 680400, "text": "they'll be able to do it."}, {"time": 683400, "text": "But these ideas and programs
are just a start."}, {"time": 687000, "text": "They'll only reach a fraction
of the young people that we need to reach."}, {"time": 691640, "text": "We want to take these ideas
and find ways to scale them up."}, {"time": 695800, "text": "To reach more young people
in more communities,"}, {"time": 698280, "text": "in more places around the world."}, {"time": 701000, "text": "And we want to dream big."}, {"time": 704080, "text": "Could every school,
everywhere in the world,"}, {"time": 707800, "text": "no matter how remote or mountainous,"}, {"time": 710640, "text": "or even if it's in a refugee camp,"}, {"time": 712640, "text": "could they be connected to the internet?"}, {"time": 716120, "text": "Could we have instant translation
for young people,"}, {"time": 720000, "text": "so that you could get a good education"}, {"time": 722160, "text": "in your own language,
anywhere in the world?"}, {"time": 725640, "text": "And would it be possible"}, {"time": 727120, "text": "that we could connect
the education in your school"}, {"time": 731040, "text": "with skills that you're going to need
to get a job in your own community?"}, {"time": 735520, "text": "So that you actually can move
from school to work."}, {"time": 740360, "text": "And more."}, {"time": 741640, "text": "Can each one of us help?"}, {"time": 744000, "text": "In our everyday lives
and in our workplaces,"}, {"time": 747360, "text": "are there ways that we could
support young people?"}, {"time": 750560, "text": "Young people are asking us
for apprenticeships,"}, {"time": 753640, "text": "for job shadowing, for internships."}, {"time": 756720, "text": "Could we do this?"}, {"time": 758840, "text": "Young people are also asking us
for work-study programs,"}, {"time": 762840, "text": "places where they can learn and earn."}, {"time": 765840, "text": "Could we do this and could we
reach out to a community that's nearby,"}, {"time": 770480, "text": "that's less advantaged, and help them?"}, {"time": 774440, "text": "Young people are also saying
that they want to help other young people."}, {"time": 777880, "text": "They want more space and more voice,"}, {"time": 780880, "text": "so that they can gather
to help each other."}, {"time": 783920, "text": "In HIV centers, in refugee camps,"}, {"time": 788040, "text": "but also to stop online bullying
and early child marriage."}, {"time": 793320, "text": "We need ideas, we need
ideas that are big and small,"}, {"time": 797000, "text": "ideas that are local and global."}, {"time": 801240, "text": "This, in the end, is our responsibility."}, {"time": 804840, "text": "A massive generation of young people
are about to inherit our world."}, {"time": 810760, "text": "It is our duty to leave a legacy
of hope and opportunity"}, {"time": 815880, "text": "for them but also with them."}, {"time": 819320, "text": "Young people are
25 percent of our population."}, {"time": 822720, "text": "But they are 100 percent of our future."}, {"time": 826680, "text": "And they're calling out
for a fighting chance"}, {"time": 829800, "text": "to build a better world."}, {"time": 832400, "text": "So their call should be our calling."}, {"time": 835640, "text": "The calling of our time."}, {"time": 838520, "text": "The time is now, the need is urgent."}, {"time": 841880, "text": "And 1.8 billion young people are waiting."}, {"time": 847440, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 848680, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: wanis_kabbaj_how_nationalism_and_globalism_can_coexist
speaker: Wanis Kabbaj
title: How nationalism and globalism can coexist
transcript:
[{"time": 1692, "text": "So two weeks ago, I searched
the word "nationalist" on Twitter."}, {"time": 6109, "text": "The results were quite colorful,"}, {"time": 7974, "text": "with expressions like,
"Emboldened Racist Moron," --"}, {"time": 11351, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 12385, "text": ""White Supremacist Idiot,""}, {"time": 14534, "text": ""Fascist Sock Puppets," --"}, {"time": 16504, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 17536, "text": ""Orwellian, Hitlerian, Terrifying.""}, {"time": 20373, "text": "I then searched the word "globalist""}, {"time": 22564, "text": "and got things like,
"Socialist Sell-Outs,""}, {"time": 25790, "text": ""Disgusting Corporate Propaganda,""}, {"time": 28774, "text": ""Elitist Financial Overlords,""}, {"time": 31813, "text": ""Ruthless Cosmopolitan Rats.""}, {"time": 33949, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 35039, "text": "Even by social media standards,
the words are cruel and disgusting."}, {"time": 39379, "text": "But they reflect the intensity
of one of the most fundamental questions"}, {"time": 44125, "text": "of our times:"}, {"time": 45348, "text": "Nationalism or globalism --
what is the best path forward?"}, {"time": 49494, "text": "This question impacts
everything we care about:"}, {"time": 51949, "text": "our cultural identity,"}, {"time": 53814, "text": "our prosperity,"}, {"time": 55653, "text": "our political systems --"}, {"time": 57808, "text": "everything -- the health
of our planet -- everything."}, {"time": 61550, "text": "So on the one hand, we have nationalism."}, {"time": 64620, "text": "Collins defines it as
a "devotion to one's nation,""}, {"time": 67956, "text": "but also, a "doctrine that puts
national interests"}, {"time": 70744, "text": "above international considerations.""}, {"time": 73364, "text": "For nationalists, our modern societies
are built on national grounds:"}, {"time": 78408, "text": "we share a land, a history, a culture,
and we defend each other."}, {"time": 83288, "text": "In a big and chaotic world,"}, {"time": 85667, "text": "they see nationalism as the only
sensible way to maintain social stability."}, {"time": 91597, "text": "But alarmed globalists warn us:"}, {"time": 94056, "text": "self-centered nationalism
can easily turn ugly."}, {"time": 97803, "text": "We've seen it with 20th-century fascisms:"}, {"time": 100535, "text": "bloody wars, millions of deaths,
immeasurable destruction."}, {"time": 105390, "text": "On the other hand, we have globalism."}, {"time": 107744, "text": "The Oxford Living Dictionary
defines it as:"}, {"time": 110032, "text": ""the operation or planning
of economic and foreign policy"}, {"time": 113407, "text": "on a global basis.""}, {"time": 115574, "text": "For nationalists, globalism
is rapidly deconstructing"}, {"time": 119010, "text": "what our ancestors took decades to build."}, {"time": 121662, "text": "It's like spitting on our soldiers' tombs;"}, {"time": 124072, "text": "it's eroding our national solidarities"}, {"time": 127096, "text": "and opening the doors
to foreign invasions."}, {"time": 130705, "text": "But globalists make the case
that reinforcing our global governance"}, {"time": 135489, "text": "is the only way to tackle
big supernational problems,"}, {"time": 139240, "text": "like nuclear proliferation,"}, {"time": 142035, "text": "the global refugee crisis,"}, {"time": 144225, "text": "climate change or terrorism"}, {"time": 146965, "text": "or even the consequences of superhuman AI."}, {"time": 150970, "text": "So we are at the crossroads,"}, {"time": 153079, "text": "and we are asked to choose:"}, {"time": 154950, "text": "nationalism or globalism?"}, {"time": 159301, "text": "Having lived in four continents,"}, {"time": 160908, "text": "I've always been interested
in this question."}, {"time": 163256, "text": "But it took a whole new level
when I saw this happening:"}, {"time": 166852, "text": "the biggest surge in nationalist votes
in Western democracies"}, {"time": 171145, "text": "since World War II."}, {"time": 173413, "text": "All of a sudden,
this isn't theory anymore."}, {"time": 176412, "text": "I mean, these political movements
have built their success with ideas"}, {"time": 180422, "text": "that could mean, down the road,
losing my French citizenship"}, {"time": 183556, "text": "because I'm North African"}, {"time": 185270, "text": "or not being able to come
back home to the US"}, {"time": 187846, "text": "because I come from
a Muslim-majority country."}, {"time": 190895, "text": "You know, when you live in a democracy,"}, {"time": 193040, "text": "you live with this idea that
your government will always protect you,"}, {"time": 196973, "text": "as long as you abide by the laws."}, {"time": 199509, "text": "With the rise of national populism,"}, {"time": 202317, "text": "despite being the best citizen I can,"}, {"time": 204773, "text": "I now have to live with the idea
that my government can hurt me"}, {"time": 208375, "text": "for reasons I cannot control."}, {"time": 210579, "text": "It's very unsettling."}, {"time": 212522, "text": "But it forced me to rethink"}, {"time": 214006, "text": "and rethink this question
and try to think deeper."}, {"time": 217418, "text": "And the more I thought about it,"}, {"time": 219120, "text": "the more I started
questioning the question."}, {"time": 222191, "text": "Why would we have to choose
between nationalism and globalism,"}, {"time": 225605, "text": "between loving our country
and caring for the world?"}, {"time": 230143, "text": "There's no reason for that."}, {"time": 231472, "text": "We don't have to choose
between family and country"}, {"time": 233866, "text": "or region or religion and country."}, {"time": 235939, "text": "We already have multiple identities,
and we live with them very well."}, {"time": 240798, "text": "Why would we have to choose
between country and world?"}, {"time": 244491, "text": "What if, instead of accepting
this absurd choice,"}, {"time": 247728, "text": "we took it on ourselves to fight
this dangerous, binary thinking?"}, {"time": 252764, "text": "So for all the globalists in the audience,"}, {"time": 255129, "text": "I want to ask:"}, {"time": 256470, "text": "When I say the word "nationalist,"
what image comes to your mind?"}, {"time": 261031, "text": "Something like this?"}, {"time": 262520, "text": "Believe me, I think of that, too."}, {"time": 264823, "text": "But I'd like you to remember
that for most people,"}, {"time": 267844, "text": "nationalism feels more like this."}, {"time": 270313, "text": "Or maybe like that."}, {"time": 272418, "text": "You know, it's that thing inside you"}, {"time": 274366, "text": "when you accidentally watch
an obscure Olympic sport on TV --"}, {"time": 279075, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 281331, "text": "wait --"}, {"time": 282416, "text": "and the mere sight of an unknown athlete
wearing your national colors"}, {"time": 286347, "text": "gets you all excited."}, {"time": 288104, "text": "Your heartbeat goes up,"}, {"time": 289842, "text": "your stress level goes up,"}, {"time": 291697, "text": "and you're standing in front of the TV"}, {"time": 293544, "text": "and screaming with passion
for that athlete to win."}, {"time": 296638, "text": "That's nationalism."}, {"time": 297812, "text": "It's people happy to be together,"}, {"time": 299570, "text": "happy to belong to a large
national community."}, {"time": 302901, "text": "Why would it be wrong?"}, {"time": 305421, "text": "You know, globalists,
you may think of nationalism"}, {"time": 307794, "text": "as an old, 19th-century idea
that is destined to fade."}, {"time": 311620, "text": "But I'm sorry to tell you
that the facts are not on your side."}, {"time": 315976, "text": "When the World Values Survey
asked more than 89,000 people"}, {"time": 319828, "text": "across 60 countries"}, {"time": 321330, "text": "how proud they felt about their country,"}, {"time": 324006, "text": "88.5 percent said "very proud"
or "quite proud" --"}, {"time": 327953, "text": "88.5 percent."}, {"time": 329989, "text": "Nationalism is not
going away anytime soon."}, {"time": 333580, "text": "It's a powerful feeling
that, according to another study,"}, {"time": 337797, "text": "is a strong predictor
of individual happiness."}, {"time": 341431, "text": "It's crazy, but your happiness is more
correlated with national satisfaction"}, {"time": 346610, "text": "than with things you would expect,
like household income"}, {"time": 349915, "text": "or your job satisfaction"}, {"time": 351943, "text": "or your health satisfaction."}, {"time": 353955, "text": "So if nationalism makes people happy,"}, {"time": 356591, "text": "why would anybody take it away from them?"}, {"time": 359666, "text": "Fellow globalists, if you are like me,"}, {"time": 362398, "text": "you may be attached to globalization
for humanistic reasons."}, {"time": 365957, "text": "And you may take great joy
in some of its accomplishments since 1945."}, {"time": 370664, "text": "After all, major regions of the world
have been exceptionally peaceful;"}, {"time": 374664, "text": "extreme poverty rates around
the globe are trending down;"}, {"time": 378506, "text": "and more than two billion people,
most notably in Asia,"}, {"time": 381706, "text": "show spectacular improvements
in their standards of living."}, {"time": 385266, "text": "But studies also show
that globalization has a dark side."}, {"time": 389591, "text": "And left on the side of the road"}, {"time": 392527, "text": "are hundreds of millions of people
in Western middle classes"}, {"time": 396316, "text": "with anemic income growth
for more than two decades,"}, {"time": 399125, "text": "possibly three decades,
according to some studies."}, {"time": 402031, "text": "We cannot ignore
this elephant in our room."}, {"time": 405015, "text": "If anything, our collective energy
would be better used"}, {"time": 407672, "text": "finding ways to fix this aspect
of globalization,"}, {"time": 411093, "text": "instead of fighting this polarizing battle
against nationalism."}, {"time": 416547, "text": "So now, the nationalists in the audience,"}, {"time": 418856, "text": "I have some crusty,
nonbinary nuggets for you."}, {"time": 422184, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 424211, "text": "When I say the word "globalist,"
what comes to your mind?"}, {"time": 427496, "text": "Out-of-touch, one-percent plutocrats?"}, {"time": 429843, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 431270, "text": "Or maybe the heartless,
greedy Wall Street type, right?"}, {"time": 434402, "text": "Or maybe people like me,
with multiple origins,"}, {"time": 436884, "text": "living in a big, cosmopolitan metropolis."}, {"time": 440696, "text": "Well, you remember that World
Values Survey that I mentioned earlier?"}, {"time": 444428, "text": "It showed another fascinating finding:"}, {"time": 447074, "text": "71 percent of the world population
agreed with the statement,"}, {"time": 451417, "text": ""I am a citizen of the world.""}, {"time": 453262, "text": "Do you know what it means?"}, {"time": 455094, "text": "Most of us are simultaneously
proud of our country"}, {"time": 458347, "text": "and citizens of the world."}, {"time": 460185, "text": "And it gets even better."}, {"time": 461741, "text": "The citizens of the world in the survey
show a higher level of national pride"}, {"time": 466206, "text": "than the ones that rejected that label."}, {"time": 468754, "text": "So once and for all, being a globalist
doesn't mean betraying your country."}, {"time": 472529, "text": "It just means that you have
enough social empathy,"}, {"time": 474950, "text": "and you project some of it outside
your national borders."}, {"time": 479248, "text": "Now, I know that when I dig
into my own nationalist feelings,"}, {"time": 482756, "text": "one of my anxieties versus
the globalized world"}, {"time": 485818, "text": "is national identity:"}, {"time": 487753, "text": "How are we going to preserve
what makes us special,"}, {"time": 490972, "text": "what makes us different,"}, {"time": 492282, "text": "what brings us together?"}, {"time": 493940, "text": "And as I started thinking about it,
I realized something really strange,"}, {"time": 497946, "text": "which is that a lot of the key ingredients
of our national identities"}, {"time": 501880, "text": "actually come from outside
our national borders."}, {"time": 505032, "text": "Like, think of the letters
that we use every day."}, {"time": 507705, "text": "I don't know if you realize,"}, {"time": 509121, "text": "but the Latin script, the Latin
alphabet that we use"}, {"time": 512957, "text": "has its origins thousands of years ago,"}, {"time": 515340, "text": "near the Nile River."}, {"time": 517082, "text": "It all started with a cow just like this,"}, {"time": 520436, "text": "that was captured by a scribe
into an elegant hieroglyph."}, {"time": 525233, "text": "That hieroglyph was transcribed
by a Semite in the Sinai"}, {"time": 528820, "text": "into the letter aleph."}, {"time": 530972, "text": "Aleph traveled with Phoenicians
and reached the European shores in Greece,"}, {"time": 536036, "text": "where it became alpha,"}, {"time": 537498, "text": "the mother of our letter A."}, {"time": 539555, "text": "So that's how an Egyptian cow
became our letter A."}, {"time": 542914, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 544865, "text": "And same thing with the Egyptian house
that became bet, beta and B."}, {"time": 550951, "text": "And the Egyptian fish
that became daleth, delta and D."}, {"time": 555681, "text": "Our most fundamental texts
are full of Egyptian cows,"}, {"time": 559106, "text": "houses and fish."}, {"time": 560637, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 562565, "text": "And there are so many other examples."}, {"time": 564812, "text": "Take the United Kingdom and its monarchy."}, {"time": 567596, "text": "Queen Elizabeth II?"}, {"time": 569607, "text": "German ancestry."}, {"time": 571384, "text": "The mottos on the royal coat of arms?"}, {"time": 573721, "text": "All written in French,
not a single word of English."}, {"time": 577117, "text": "Take France and it's iconic Eiffel Tower."}, {"time": 580920, "text": "The inspiration?"}, {"time": 582754, "text": "The United States of America --"}, {"time": 584774, "text": "and I don't mean Las Vegas,"}, {"time": 586092, "text": "I mean 19th-century New York."}, {"time": 587874, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 588985, "text": "This was the tallest building
in New York in the mid-19th century."}, {"time": 592526, "text": "Does it remind you of something?"}, {"time": 595147, "text": "And you may think of China
as a self-contained civilization,"}, {"time": 598610, "text": "protected behind its Great Wall."}, {"time": 600763, "text": "But think twice."}, {"time": 602305, "text": "The Chinese official ideology?"}, {"time": 604375, "text": "Marxism, made in Germany."}, {"time": 608064, "text": "One of China's biggest religions?"}, {"time": 609733, "text": "Buddhism, imported from India."}, {"time": 612365, "text": "India's favorite pastime?"}, {"time": 614674, "text": "Cricket."}, {"time": 616222, "text": "I really love this quote from Ashis Nandy,"}, {"time": 618664, "text": "who said, "Cricket is an Indian game
accidentally discovered by the British.""}, {"time": 623565, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 625147, "text": "So these are good reminders that a lot
of what we love in our national traditions"}, {"time": 631716, "text": "actually come from previous
waves of globalization."}, {"time": 634835, "text": "And beyond individual symbols,
there are whole national traditions"}, {"time": 638563, "text": "that could not have existed
without globalization."}, {"time": 642070, "text": "And the example that comes to my mind
is a world-beloved national tradition:"}, {"time": 646399, "text": "Italian cuisine."}, {"time": 648056, "text": "My friends, if you ever have a chance"}, {"time": 649884, "text": "to go to a superauthentic
Italian restaurant"}, {"time": 652472, "text": "that only serves ancient Roman recipes,"}, {"time": 655141, "text": "my advice for you is: don't go."}, {"time": 657651, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 659102, "text": "You'd get very, very disappointed."}, {"time": 661353, "text": "No spaghetti, no pasta --"}, {"time": 663241, "text": "that really started in Sicily
in the eighth century,"}, {"time": 666129, "text": "when it was under Arabian rule."}, {"time": 668407, "text": "No perfect espresso,
no creamy cappuccino --"}, {"time": 671068, "text": "that came from Abyssinia
via Yemen in the 17th century."}, {"time": 674925, "text": "And of course,
no perfect pizza Napoletana --"}, {"time": 677458, "text": "how would you make it without
the tomatoes of the New World?"}, {"time": 681736, "text": "No, instead, you would be served
probably a lot of porridge,"}, {"time": 685799, "text": "some vegetable -- mostly
cabbage -- some cheese,"}, {"time": 689480, "text": "and maybe if you're lucky,"}, {"time": 691210, "text": "the absolute delicacy of that time --"}, {"time": 694356, "text": "mmm, perfectly cooked fattened dormice."}, {"time": 697911, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 700115, "text": "Thankfully, it was not a close tradition
preserved by fanatic watchdogs."}, {"time": 704431, "text": "No, it was an open process,"}, {"time": 706108, "text": "nourished by explorers, traders,
street sellers and innovative home cooks."}, {"time": 712021, "text": "And in many ways,
globalization is a chance"}, {"time": 714111, "text": "for our national traditions to be
questioned, regenerated, reinterpreted,"}, {"time": 719398, "text": "to attract new converts
to stay vibrant and relevant over time."}, {"time": 723841, "text": "So just remember this:"}, {"time": 725480, "text": "most of us nationalists
in the world are globalists,"}, {"time": 728202, "text": "and most of us globalists
in the world are nationalists."}, {"time": 731046, "text": "A lot of what we like
in our national traditions"}, {"time": 734135, "text": "come from outside our national borders."}, {"time": 736475, "text": "And the reason we venture
outside our national borders"}, {"time": 739221, "text": "is to discover these other
national traditions."}, {"time": 741941, "text": "So the real question should not be"}, {"time": 743684, "text": "to choose between
nationalism and globalism."}, {"time": 746394, "text": "The real questions is:
How can we do both better?"}, {"time": 749932, "text": "It's a complex question
for a complex world"}, {"time": 752807, "text": "that calls for creative,
nonbinary solutions."}, {"time": 756334, "text": "What are you waiting for?"}, {"time": 757715, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 758890, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: vinay_shandal_how_conscious_investors_can_turn_up_the_heat_and_make_companies_change
speaker: Vinay Shandal
title: How conscious investors can turn up the heat and make companies change
transcript:
[{"time": 1047, "text": "We love to engage
on the issues of the day."}, {"time": 4302, "text": "We love it."}, {"time": 5484, "text": "We comment on the news,"}, {"time": 6966, "text": "we post our views on social media,"}, {"time": 9333, "text": "we march, we protest ..."}, {"time": 12095, "text": "But who among us is working on solutions,"}, {"time": 15874, "text": "big solutions to big issues,"}, {"time": 18358, "text": "like gun violence,"}, {"time": 20294, "text": "mistreatment of workers,"}, {"time": 22053, "text": "flood, famine, drought?"}, {"time": 23786, "text": "Who is on it?"}, {"time": 26331, "text": "Boom!"}, {"time": 28781, "text": "These guys."}, {"time": 30105, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 32142, "text": "What? You were hoping for Peter Parker?"}, {"time": 34862, "text": "The Avengers?"}, {"time": 36314, "text": "You don't expect this beacon of diversity,"}, {"time": 39086, "text": "these good-looking, nicely dressed dudes
just oozing charisma to solve the issues?"}, {"time": 45425, "text": "Well good, because they're actually
not going to solve the issues."}, {"time": 48600, "text": "But before you dismiss them,"}, {"time": 51968, "text": "let me say, they're not going
to solve the issues,"}, {"time": 54392, "text": "but they will show us how."}, {"time": 57100, "text": "So who are they?"}, {"time": 58866, "text": "They're activist investors:"}, {"time": 60950, "text": "Carl Icahn, Dan Loeb,
Paul Singer, Barry Rosenstein."}, {"time": 66891, "text": "These are the modern-day
OGs of Wall Street."}, {"time": 70498, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 71575, "text": "These are scary dudes."}, {"time": 72761, "text": "I don't mean Green Goblin scary."}, {"time": 74440, "text": "I mean real scary."}, {"time": 77169, "text": "The fear they strike in the hearts
of a company's CEO and board"}, {"time": 81838, "text": "when they enter its stock"}, {"time": 83721, "text": "is the same fear you feel
when you hear a bear outside your tent,"}, {"time": 88599, "text": "and it's dark,"}, {"time": 89866, "text": "and you're sitting there
with a mouthful of Doritos --"}, {"time": 92422, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 93507, "text": "that just moments ago,"}, {"time": 94685, "text": "you had snuck out of the tent
to pull down from the bear hang,"}, {"time": 97677, "text": "because you had the munchies."}, {"time": 99099, "text": "That fear."}, {"time": 101245, "text": "And in that moment, you are praying,"}, {"time": 102987, "text": ""Oh Lord, please let this bear
be passing through.""}, {"time": 106397, "text": "That bear is not passing through!"}, {"time": 109253, "text": "That bear made a detour for you."}, {"time": 112041, "text": "Bears like Doritos!"}, {"time": 114066, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 115222, "text": "Activists like money."}, {"time": 117550, "text": "Some activists also like Doritos,
but they definitely want money."}, {"time": 124313, "text": "And the way they make money,
the way they create value,"}, {"time": 128671, "text": "is by getting management of corporations"}, {"time": 131293, "text": "to make changes."}, {"time": 134005, "text": "Now, some will argue
that the changes they create,"}, {"time": 137151, "text": "the value they create,
is too short-term in nature."}, {"time": 140349, "text": "And others will say the tactics
they use are egregious."}, {"time": 144130, "text": "I agree."}, {"time": 145568, "text": "Long, drawn-out lawsuits,"}, {"time": 147304, "text": "public smear campaigns --"}, {"time": 148812, "text": "there is no need for that."}, {"time": 151741, "text": "But I must say, there's
a small handful of activists,"}, {"time": 154918, "text": "very small,"}, {"time": 156238, "text": "that go to great lengths
to be constructive and collaborative."}, {"time": 159198, "text": "And overall, we have to give credit
where credit is due."}, {"time": 161944, "text": "As a group, they have managed
to catalyze large-scale change"}, {"time": 165814, "text": "in large corporations,"}, {"time": 167059, "text": "and that's no small feat."}, {"time": 170400, "text": "Now, imagine a world"}, {"time": 172888, "text": "where all investors were working
with management to make change,"}, {"time": 175972, "text": "not just to make more money,"}, {"time": 178981, "text": "but to improve
the environment and society."}, {"time": 181948, "text": "Imagine what a greener
and better world this would be."}, {"time": 186636, "text": "Now, why? Why would an investor bother?"}, {"time": 188612, "text": "And at first, blush I'm with you:
Why would an investor care?"}, {"time": 191560, "text": "Because if doing well on ESG issues --"}, {"time": 193927, "text": "environmental, social
and governance issues --"}, {"time": 196736, "text": "was just an act of good
corporate citizenship,"}, {"time": 200441, "text": "then I agree, investors would not care."}, {"time": 202374, "text": "But the good news,"}, {"time": 203841, "text": "and perhaps the saving grace
for our collective futures,"}, {"time": 207043, "text": "is that it's so much more than
an act of good corporate citizenship."}, {"time": 211376, "text": "It's good business."}, {"time": 213383, "text": "There's now enough evidence
that shows a clear correlation"}, {"time": 216167, "text": "between ESG performance
and financial performance."}, {"time": 219397, "text": "Companies that do good
for the environment and society"}, {"time": 222628, "text": "also do well financially."}, {"time": 225362, "text": "And some of the best
companies are catching on."}, {"time": 227831, "text": "Like Adidas:"}, {"time": 229186, "text": "Adidas is cleaning up the ocean
and making money in the process."}, {"time": 233132, "text": "Adidas teamed up with an organization
called Parley for the Oceans."}, {"time": 237356, "text": "Parley goes out and collects
plastic waste from the ocean."}, {"time": 240917, "text": "Adidas uses the plastic waste
to make shoes."}, {"time": 243409, "text": "Shoes made with plastic from the ocean:"}, {"time": 246040, "text": "good for the environment
and good for business."}, {"time": 249210, "text": "Because if you know that rapidly growing
consumer segment known as hipsters --"}, {"time": 253721, "text": "and I know you know hipsters --"}, {"time": 255387, "text": "then you know that a hipster faced with
the choice between a no-name shoe"}, {"time": 259024, "text": "and an Adidas made with
plastic from the ocean"}, {"time": 261334, "text": "will pick the Adidas every day
of the week and twice on Sunday,"}, {"time": 265332, "text": "and then walk around like it's no big deal"}, {"time": 267769, "text": "but look for every opportunity
to talk about them."}, {"time": 271605, "text": "Like, in an Uber Pool."}, {"time": 273439, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 274509, "text": ""Hey, I noticed you looking at my feet.""}, {"time": 277144, "text": ""What? Dude, no, I'm just making slides.
I'm a consultant. I make slides."}, {"time": 281334, "text": "I'm making PowerPoint slides,
I'm not looking --""}, {"time": 283708, "text": ""No, it's fine."}, {"time": 284900, "text": "I get why you'd be looking."}, {"time": 286327, "text": "The plastic on my shoe
must be bothering you."}, {"time": 288455, "text": "Well, let me talk about it
for the rest of this ride."}, {"time": 291007, "text": "You see, the plastic on my shoe
is from the ocean,"}, {"time": 293441, "text": "on my feet, not in your fish,"}, {"time": 295616, "text": "being walked on, not being munched on."}, {"time": 297796, "text": "Happy feet. Happy fish. Happy ocean."}, {"time": 300343, "text": "Doing my part. I got eco-shoes.
I got eco-shoes."}, {"time": 302710, "text": "You need some eco-shoes?""}, {"time": 304563, "text": "And so on, just cornering him.
We've all been there."}, {"time": 307051, "text": ""Hey, pass me your cell phone.
I'll give you a discount code."}, {"time": 309949, "text": "Let me give you a discount code.""}, {"time": 311580, "text": "We've all been --"}, {"time": 312755, "text": "Folks, I have jumped out
of moving Uber Pools."}, {"time": 314927, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 316056, "text": "Just, moving, highway, I'm out. I'm out."}, {"time": 320567, "text": "But we've got to forgive the hipsters,
we need to love the hipsters."}, {"time": 323878, "text": "We need hipsters,
and we need companies like Adidas,"}, {"time": 326391, "text": "and what we need most is for investors
to convince other companies"}, {"time": 329915, "text": "to behave like Adidas."}, {"time": 331551, "text": "And herein lies the challenge."}, {"time": 333969, "text": "There's a growing group of investors,
call them "conscious investors.""}, {"time": 337887, "text": "Conscious investors care about ESG issues."}, {"time": 341791, "text": "And they talk a lot about
engaging management on ESG issues."}, {"time": 346002, "text": "But they don't actually get
management to make changes"}, {"time": 348671, "text": "that will improve
the environment and society."}, {"time": 352078, "text": "And this is where conscious investors
can take a page from the playbook"}, {"time": 355678, "text": "of the activist investors,"}, {"time": 357633, "text": "because the activist investors have no
issues getting management to make changes."}, {"time": 361574, "text": "They have no issues turning up the heat."}, {"time": 364124, "text": "Take Paul Singer."}, {"time": 365346, "text": "He's an old-school Wall Street OG,"}, {"time": 367713, "text": "now in his 70s, loves Doritos,
loves making money."}, {"time": 372474, "text": "Argentina owed Paul 600 million dollars"}, {"time": 375905, "text": "and would not pay."}, {"time": 378386, "text": "Big mistake."}, {"time": 379576, "text": "You can't take money from an OG
