human heart and mind."}, {"time": 643671, "text": "Over time,"}, {"time": 645738, "text": "to my surprise,"}, {"time": 647279, "text": "dozens and dozens of young employees
at Airbnb sought me out"}, {"time": 651089, "text": "for private mentoring sessions."}, {"time": 653132, "text": "But in reality, we were often
just mentoring each other."}, {"time": 657559, "text": "In sum, CEO Brian Chesky brought me in
for my industry knowledge,"}, {"time": 663899, "text": "but what I really offered
was my well-earned wisdom."}, {"time": 668182, "text": "Maybe it's time we retire the term
"knowledge worker""}, {"time": 673182, "text": "and replaced it with "wisdom worker.""}, {"time": 676775, "text": "We have five generations
in the workplace today,"}, {"time": 679427, "text": "and we can operate like
separate isolationist countries,"}, {"time": 682843, "text": "or we can actually start to find a way
to bridge these generational borders."}, {"time": 690250, "text": "And it's time for us to actually look
at how to change up the physics of wisdom"}, {"time": 694849, "text": "so it actually flows in both directions,"}, {"time": 696841, "text": "from old to young and from young to old."}, {"time": 700908, "text": "How can you apply this in your own life?"}, {"time": 703837, "text": "Personally, who can you reach out to"}, {"time": 706790, "text": "to create a mutual
mentorship relationship?"}, {"time": 710843, "text": "And organizationally,
how can you create the conditions"}, {"time": 715516, "text": "to foster an intergenerational
flow of wisdom?"}, {"time": 720016, "text": "This is the new sharing economy."}, {"time": 723792, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 724967, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: rebecca_onie_what_americans_agree_on_when_it_comes_to_health
speaker: Rebecca Onie
title: What Americans agree on when it comes to health
transcript:
[{"time": 984, "text": "Today, we are a country divided,"}, {"time": 3666, "text": "or at least that's what we're told."}, {"time": 6065, "text": "We are torn apart
by immigration, education, guns"}, {"time": 11217, "text": "and health care."}, {"time": 13038, "text": "Health care is ugly and it is loud,"}, {"time": 16432, "text": "so loud that it threatens
to drown out everything else."}, {"time": 20607, "text": "(Voice-over) Protesters: Health care
is a human right! Fight, fight, fight!"}, {"time": 24211, "text": "Protesters: Hey hey! Ho ho!
Obamacare has got to go!"}, {"time": 29009, "text": "Rebecca Onie: But what if
underneath all the noise,"}, {"time": 31481, "text": "we're not divided?"}, {"time": 33219, "text": "What if the things that we don't ask about"}, {"time": 35900, "text": "are the things that we most agree upon?"}, {"time": 38822, "text": "It turns out that when we ask
the right questions,"}, {"time": 41509, "text": "the answers are startling,"}, {"time": 44002, "text": "because we agree, not on health care,
but on something more important:"}, {"time": 49997, "text": "we agree on health."}, {"time": 52627, "text": "For 20 years, I've been obsessed
with one question:"}, {"time": 56295, "text": "What do we, what do all of us need
in order to be healthy?"}, {"time": 61043, "text": "As a college student in 1995,"}, {"time": 63117, "text": "I spent months talking to physicians
at a chaotic hospital in Boston,"}, {"time": 67882, "text": "asking them, "What's the one thing
your patients most need to be healthy?""}, {"time": 73709, "text": "They shared the same story
again and again,"}, {"time": 76246, "text": "one that I've heard hundreds
of variations of since."}, {"time": 80143, "text": "They say, "Every day I see a patient
with an asthma exacerbation,"}, {"time": 83480, "text": "and I prescribe a controller medication."}, {"time": 86100, "text": "But I know she is living
in a mold-infested apartment."}, {"time": 89860, "text": "Or I see a kid with an ear infection,
and I prescribe antibiotics,"}, {"time": 94180, "text": "but I know there is no food at home."}, {"time": 96702, "text": "And I don't ask about those issues,
because there's nothing I can do.""}, {"time": 101586, "text": "Now, it seemed that it shouldn't
be so complicated"}, {"time": 104039, "text": "to design a doctor's visit around
what people actually need to be healthy."}, {"time": 108925, "text": "So I created Health Leads,"}, {"time": 110295, "text": "an organization enabling thousands
of physicians and other caregivers"}, {"time": 115104, "text": "to ask their patients,"}, {"time": 116890, "text": ""What do you need to be healthy?""}, {"time": 118838, "text": "and then prescribe those things --"}, {"time": 121330, "text": "fruits and vegetables, heat in the winter,"}, {"time": 124570, "text": "electricity to refrigerate
their medication --"}, {"time": 127859, "text": "and we then navigated
patients to those resources"}, {"time": 131242, "text": "in their communities."}, {"time": 133584, "text": "The model works."}, {"time": 134764, "text": "A Mass General Hospital study found that
navigating patients to essential resources"}, {"time": 139573, "text": "is associated with improvements
in blood pressure and cholesterol levels"}, {"time": 144024, "text": "similar to introducing a new drug,"}, {"time": 146881, "text": "but without all the side effects."}, {"time": 149817, "text": "So two decades later, what's changed?"}, {"time": 153084, "text": "It's now widely recognized
that just 20 percent of health outcomes"}, {"time": 157093, "text": "are tied to medical care,"}, {"time": 159117, "text": "whereas up to 70 percent
are tied to healthy behaviors"}, {"time": 164201, "text": "and what's called the social
determinants of health --"}, {"time": 167700, "text": "basically, everything that happens to us
for that vast majority of time"}, {"time": 171839, "text": "when we're not in the doctor's office"}, {"time": 173866, "text": "or the hospital."}, {"time": 176509, "text": "Health care executives
now routinely remind us"}, {"time": 178939, "text": "that our zip code matters more
than our genetic code."}, {"time": 182441, "text": "And one health care publication
even recently had the audacity"}, {"time": 186244, "text": "to describe the social
determinants of health"}, {"time": 188447, "text": "as "the feel-good buzzword of the year.""}, {"time": 191785, "text": "Now, there's been some action, too."}, {"time": 193500, "text": "Over the past decade, six major
health care providers and insurers"}, {"time": 197403, "text": "have committed over 600 million dollars"}, {"time": 200053, "text": "to affordable housing,"}, {"time": 201778, "text": "recognizing that it reduces
infant mortality"}, {"time": 205777, "text": "and increases life expectancy."}, {"time": 209055, "text": "But let's be honest."}, {"time": 210786, "text": "Is our 3.5 trillion dollar
health care system"}, {"time": 215296, "text": "fundamentally designed to create health?"}, {"time": 218317, "text": "Absolutely not."}, {"time": 220468, "text": "Take access to healthy food."}, {"time": 222952, "text": "Not long ago, a teenage boy shows up
at a hospital in Baltimore,"}, {"time": 227140, "text": "losing weight."}, {"time": 228683, "text": "Just as his doctors are huddled up
figuring out which metabolic panels"}, {"time": 232639, "text": "and blood tests to run,"}, {"time": 234745, "text": "one of my colleagues asks out loud,"}, {"time": 237108, "text": ""Do you think he might be hungry?""}, {"time": 240314, "text": "It turned out that this kid
had been kicked out of his housing"}, {"time": 243257, "text": "and literally hadn't had a meal in weeks."}, {"time": 246900, "text": "He said he was "... so relieved
that somebody finally asked me.""}, {"time": 252269, "text": "Somehow, we've created
a health care system"}, {"time": 254766, "text": "where asking a patient "Are you hungry?""}, {"time": 257666, "text": "is so far outside the bounds
of what counts as health care"}, {"time": 261661, "text": "that we mostly fail or forget
to ask altogether;"}, {"time": 265708, "text": "where doctors lament a hospital's
"no third sandwich policy,""}, {"time": 270590, "text": "meaning that if you're
a hungry patient in the ER,"}, {"time": 273484, "text": "you can have only two free sandwiches,"}, {"time": 276319, "text": "but as many MRIs as the doctor orders;"}, {"time": 280186, "text": "where, in 2016 in the state of Texas,"}, {"time": 283323, "text": "they spent 1.2 billion dollars
on the medical costs of malnutrition"}, {"time": 288806, "text": "instead of on access to healthy food;"}, {"time": 291385, "text": "where a Centers for Medicare
and Medicaid Services program"}, {"time": 295124, "text": "stratifies hungry patients,"}, {"time": 297571, "text": "so that some get access to food
and some get information about food,"}, {"time": 302820, "text": "with the justification that
doing nothing for hungry patients"}, {"time": 305976, "text": "is standard and usual care
in this country."}, {"time": 309649, "text": "And that's just food."}, {"time": 310900, "text": "The same is true
for housing, electricity ..."}, {"time": 313643, "text": "The bottom line is,
health care may be changing,"}, {"time": 317114, "text": "but not by enough
and certainly not fast enough."}, {"time": 321418, "text": "We ask the wrong questions
of our doctors, of our patients,"}, {"time": 325383, "text": "but also of our citizens."}, {"time": 328423, "text": "We ask about and argue about health care,"}, {"time": 331317, "text": "but how do voters think about health?"}, {"time": 334042, "text": "No one could tell us
the answer to that question,"}, {"time": 337151, "text": "so we launched a new initiative"}, {"time": 339122, "text": "and hired a polling firm
to ask voters across the country:"}, {"time": 342517, "text": "What do you need to be healthy?"}, {"time": 346893, "text": "What was so striking about this
was that no one has any clue"}, {"time": 352207, "text": "what we are talking about in health care."}, {"time": 355135, "text": "Voters do not think
the social determinants of health"}, {"time": 358095, "text": "is a feel-good phrase."}, {"time": 360097, "text": "They actually hate it."}, {"time": 362265, "text": ""What uneducated person
came up with that language?""}, {"time": 365193, "text": "one of the voters said."}, {"time": 367092, "text": "Or my favorite was the guy who said,"}, {"time": 369155, "text": ""You're killing me.""}, {"time": 371842, "text": "But when you strip away
all the ridiculousness"}, {"time": 374463, "text": "of our language in health care,"}, {"time": 376365, "text": "we know exactly what creates health."}, {"time": 379165, "text": "So take Charlotte, North Carolina."}, {"time": 381493, "text": "We had two focus groups,"}, {"time": 383004, "text": "one of African American Democratic women
and one of white Republican women."}, {"time": 387229, "text": "And we asked them,
"If you had a hundred dollars,"}, {"time": 390074, "text": "how would you spend it
to buy health in your community?"}, {"time": 393672, "text": "Turns out, they agree
nearly to the last percentage point."}, {"time": 398537, "text": "First, they agree that health care
only sort of impacts health."}, {"time": 402641, "text": "So they choose to spend
the majority of their dollars"}, {"time": 405210, "text": "outside of hospitals and clinics."}, {"time": 407632, "text": "And second, they agree
on what creates health,"}, {"time": 410792, "text": "spending 19 percent on affordable housing"}, {"time": 413041, "text": "and about 25 percent
on access to healthy food."}, {"time": 416868, "text": "So I am sure you are thinking,
"This has got to be a fluke.""}, {"time": 420388, "text": "But it's not."}, {"time": 422112, "text": "White and Latino male
swing voters in Seattle,"}, {"time": 425567, "text": "white and African American
Democratic voters in Cleveland,"}, {"time": 429482, "text": "white male Republicans in Dallas,"}, {"time": 432135, "text": "low-income white Democrats
in Hendersonville, North Carolina:"}, {"time": 436594, "text": "their answers are strikingly similar,"}, {"time": 439498, "text": "with all of them choosing
to spend more money"}, {"time": 441819, "text": "on healthy food and safe housing"}, {"time": 444419, "text": "than they would on hospitals
and health centers."}, {"time": 448430, "text": "When you ask the right questions,"}, {"time": 450702, "text": "it becomes pretty clear:"}, {"time": 452974, "text": "we may be fractured
on health care in this country,"}, {"time": 456481, "text": "but we are unified on health."}, {"time": 459839, "text": "The thing that I've been
struggling with is why."}, {"time": 463023, "text": "Why do we agree on health?"}, {"time": 465712, "text": "We agree on health
because it is common sense."}, {"time": 469270, "text": "We all know that the things
we need to get healthy --"}, {"time": 472526, "text": "medicine and medical care --"}, {"time": 474784, "text": "are not the things we need to be healthy,"}, {"time": 477402, "text": "to not get sick in the first place."}, {"time": 480255, "text": "But we also agree because
of common experience."}, {"time": 483966, "text": "In a study of 5,000 patients,"}, {"time": 486628, "text": "24 percent of the patients
with commercial health insurance --"}, {"time": 490936, "text": "meaning, they had a job --"}, {"time": 492770, "text": "still ran out of food or struggled
to find housing or transportation"}, {"time": 497511, "text": "or other essential resources."}, {"time": 499542, "text": "Twenty-four percent."}, {"time": 501505, "text": "And we saw the same thing
in our focus groups."}, {"time": 503873, "text": "Nearly every voter knew
what it meant to struggle,"}, {"time": 507645, "text": "either themselves or their families"}, {"time": 510414, "text": "or their neighbors."}, {"time": 512674, "text": "One of those white Republican
women in Charlotte was a waitress"}, {"time": 517443, "text": "struggling to stay awake
with an enormous Big Gulp soda."}, {"time": 521580, "text": "She just looked exhausted."}, {"time": 524160, "text": "And she was."}, {"time": 525771, "text": "She told us that she worked two jobs"}, {"time": 527772, "text": "but still could not afford
a membership to the Y,"}, {"time": 530785, "text": "but it was OK that she couldn't go
to the gym, she said,"}, {"time": 533898, "text": "because she also could not afford gas"}, {"time": 536609, "text": "and walked 10 miles to and from work"}, {"time": 539364, "text": "every single day."}, {"time": 542212, "text": "Listening to her, I felt
this familiar panic rise in me,"}, {"time": 546948, "text": "the residue of my own childhood."}, {"time": 550441, "text": "When I was 10 years old,"}, {"time": 552059, "text": "my father lay on the living room floor"}, {"time": 554657, "text": "in the grips of one
of his many depressions."}, {"time": 558435, "text": "As I crouched next to him, he told me
that he wanted to kill himself."}, {"time": 565721, "text": "My father lived,"}, {"time": 567828, "text": "but he struggled to work."}, {"time": 569939, "text": "And my family survived,"}, {"time": 571556, "text": "but we teetered,"}, {"time": 573288, "text": "down one paycheck,"}, {"time": 574789, "text": "relying on my mom's schoolteacher salary."}, {"time": 577771, "text": "Even as a little kid, I knew
we lived in the shadow"}, {"time": 581816, "text": "of financial and emotional collapse."}, {"time": 585482, "text": "This is really hard to say,"}, {"time": 587744, "text": "because it's taken me 25 years
to be honest with myself"}, {"time": 591697, "text": "that this is why I do this work:"}, {"time": 595100, "text": "knowing that my father
needed health care to recover,"}, {"time": 598466, "text": "but to be healthy, my family
needed something else,"}, {"time": 602052, "text": "we needed a decent income;"}, {"time": 604406, "text": "and knowing, as so many do more than I,"}, {"time": 607667, "text": "that panic when the basics
threaten to slip away."}, {"time": 612378, "text": "To the voters in our focus groups,
the solutions were straightforward."}, {"time": 616586, "text": "As one of those white Republican
women in Charlotte said,"}, {"time": 619866, "text": ""Instead of putting all this money
into health care,"}, {"time": 622606, "text": "put it into affordable housing."}, {"time": 624458, "text": "You know, like, take it
and distribute it differently.""}, {"time": 629201, "text": "It turns out that when you have
the right language"}, {"time": 631876, "text": "and you ask the right questions,"}, {"time": 634292, "text": "the answers become remarkably clear"}, {"time": 636929, "text": "and unanimous."}, {"time": 641055, "text": "What we know is that,
despite all the noise,"}, {"time": 646259, "text": "the plan for health care in this country"}, {"time": 649431, "text": "is that there is no plan."}, {"time": 651880, "text": "But we have something more powerful
than any politician's bill,"}, {"time": 656200, "text": "any candidate's platform,"}, {"time": 658987, "text": "any think tank's policy statement."}, {"time": 661670, "text": "We have our common sense
and our common experience."}, {"time": 666057, "text": "So I ask, if you are
a health care executive:"}, {"time": 670172, "text": "Do you know how many
of your patients run out of food"}, {"time": 672900, "text": "or struggle to pay the rent
at the end of the month?"}, {"time": 675830, "text": "Is that data on your scorecard,"}, {"time": 678230, "text": "shaping your business and your bonuses?"}, {"time": 681796, "text": "If you are a politician:"}, {"time": 683740, "text": "Will you continue to fight
on the scorched earth of health care,"}, {"time": 688043, "text": "or will you act on what your voters,"}, {"time": 690512, "text": "what Democratic
and Republican voters alike,"}, {"time": 693426, "text": "already know,"}, {"time": 694841, "text": "which is that good wages,
healthy food and safe housing"}, {"time": 698217, "text": "are health?"}, {"time": 699997, "text": "And for the rest of us,
for the citizens of this country:"}, {"time": 704131, "text": "Will we demand accountability
to what we know to be true,"}, {"time": 708481, "text": "which is that our common sense,"}, {"time": 710691, "text": "our common experience,"}, {"time": 712535, "text": "makes us the experts
in what it takes to be healthy?"}, {"time": 717123, "text": "This moment, as it turns out,"}, {"time": 719779, "text": "is not about changing minds."}, {"time": 722632, "text": "It is about something more powerful."}, {"time": 725205, "text": "It is about changing the questions we ask"}, {"time": 727803, "text": "and quieting the noise
to hear each other's answers."}, {"time": 732659, "text": "It is about the radical possibility
that we the patients,"}, {"time": 736601, "text": "we the physicians, we the caregivers,"}, {"time": 739082, "text": "we the health care executives"}, {"time": 740522, "text": "and yes, even we the people,"}, {"time": 742610, "text": "that we agree."}, {"time": 744642, "text": "And it is now time --"}, {"time": 746556, "text": "in fact, long overdue --"}, {"time": 748531, "text": "for us to marshal the courage"}, {"time": 751409, "text": "to hear those answers
and to act upon them."}, {"time": 755058, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 756264, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: ashwini_anburajan_how_cryptocurrency_can_help_new_companies_get_investment_capital
speaker: Ashwini Anburajan
title: How cryptocurrency can help startups get investment capital
transcript:
[{"time": 1560, "text": "When I was raising investment
for my startup,"}, {"time": 4120, "text": "a venture capitalist said to me,"}, {"time": 6240, "text": ""Ashwini, I think you're going to raise
a few million dollars."}, {"time": 10440, "text": "And your company --
it's going to sell for 50 to 70 million."}, {"time": 15520, "text": "You're going to be really excited."}, {"time": 18000, "text": "Your early investors
are going to be really excited."}, {"time": 21520, "text": "And I'm going to be really upset."}, {"time": 23920, "text": "So I'm not going to invest in this deal.""}, {"time": 26840, "text": "I remember just being dumbstruck."}, {"time": 31440, "text": "Who would be unhappy"}, {"time": 33200, "text": "with putting four or five
million dollars into a company"}, {"time": 36880, "text": "and having it sell for 50 to 70 million?"}, {"time": 41880, "text": "I was a first-time founder."}, {"time": 44000, "text": "I didn't have a wealthy network
of individuals to turn to for investment,"}, {"time": 47480, "text": "so I went to venture capitalists"}, {"time": 49080, "text": "the most common form of investor
in a technology company."}, {"time": 53240, "text": "But I'd never taken the time to understand"}, {"time": 56640, "text": "what was motivating that VC to invest."}, {"time": 60960, "text": "I believe we're living
in a golden era of entrepreneurship."}, {"time": 65040, "text": "There is more opportunity
to build companies than ever before."}, {"time": 70160, "text": "But the financial systems
designed to fund that innovation,"}, {"time": 74440, "text": "venture capital,"}, {"time": 76320, "text": "they haven't evolved
in the past 20 to 30 years."}, {"time": 80080, "text": "Venture capital was designed
to pour large sums of money"}, {"time": 84000, "text": "into a small number of companies
that can sell for over a billion dollars."}, {"time": 89560, "text": "It was not designed to sprinkle capital
across many companies"}, {"time": 94760, "text": "that have the potential to succeed
but for less, like my own."}, {"time": 99640, "text": "That limits the number
of ideas that get funded,"}, {"time": 103120, "text": "the number of companies that are created"}, {"time": 105280, "text": "and who can actually receive
that funding to grow."}, {"time": 109480, "text": "And I think it inspires a tough question:"}, {"time": 112160, "text": "What's our goal with entrepreneurship?"}, {"time": 115280, "text": "If our goal is to create a tiny number
of billion-dollar companies,"}, {"time": 120840, "text": "let's stick with venture
capital, it's working."}, {"time": 123760, "text": "But if our goal is to inspire innovation"}, {"time": 127720, "text": "and empower more people
to build companies of all sizes,"}, {"time": 131720, "text": "we need a new way to fund those ideas."}, {"time": 133800, "text": "We need a more flexible system"}, {"time": 135760, "text": "that doesn't squeeze
entrepreneurs and investors"}, {"time": 139440, "text": "into one rigid financial outcome."}, {"time": 143960, "text": "We need to democratize access to capital."}, {"time": 148240, "text": "In the summer of 2017,
I went out to San Francisco,"}, {"time": 151080, "text": "to join a tech accelerator
with 30 other companies."}, {"time": 154400, "text": "The accelerator was supposed to teach us
how to raise venture capital."}, {"time": 158640, "text": "But when I got out there,"}, {"time": 160120, "text": "the startup community was buzzing
about ICOs, or Initial Coin Offerings."}, {"time": 166920, "text": "For the first time, ICOs had raised
more money for young startups"}, {"time": 172920, "text": "than venture capital had."}, {"time": 175600, "text": "It was the first week of the program."}, {"time": 177440, "text": "Tequila Friday."}, {"time": 179040, "text": "And the founders couldn't stop talking."}, {"time": 181080, "text": ""I'm going to raise an ICO.""}, {"time": 182520, "text": ""I'm going to raise an ICO.""}, {"time": 184080, "text": "Until one guy goes,"}, {"time": 185720, "text": ""How cool if we did this all together?"}, {"time": 188560, "text": "We should do an ICO that combines
the value of all of our companies"}, {"time": 192160, "text": "and raise money as a group.""}, {"time": 194320, "text": "At that point, I had to ask
the obvious question,"}, {"time": 196680, "text": ""Guys, what's an ICO?""}, {"time": 199320, "text": "ICOs were a way for young
companies to raise money"}, {"time": 203320, "text": "by issuing a digital currency"}, {"time": 205800, "text": "tied to the value and services
that the company provides."}, {"time": 210120, "text": "The currency acts similar
to shares in a company,"}, {"time": 212640, "text": "like on the public stock market,"}, {"time": 214600, "text": "increasing in value as it's traded online."}, {"time": 218400, "text": "Most important,
ICOs expanded the investor pool,"}, {"time": 223760, "text": "from a few hundred venture capital firms"}, {"time": 226200, "text": "to millions of everyday people,
excited to invest."}, {"time": 231360, "text": "This market represented more money."}, {"time": 234120, "text": "It represented more investors."}, {"time": 236320, "text": "Which meant a greater
likelihood to get funded."}, {"time": 240600, "text": "I was sold."}, {"time": 242800, "text": "The idea, though, of doing it together
still seemed a little crazy."}, {"time": 246280, "text": "Startups compete
with each other for investment,"}, {"time": 248840, "text": "it takes hundreds of meetings
to get a check."}, {"time": 253560, "text": "That I would spend my precious 15 minutes
in front of an investor"}, {"time": 257519, "text": "talking not just about my own company,
but all the companies in the batch,"}, {"time": 261560, "text": "was unprecedented."}, {"time": 264560, "text": "But the idea caught on."}, {"time": 266520, "text": "And we decided to cooperate,
rather than compete."}, {"time": 272000, "text": "Every company put 10 percent
of their equity into a communal pool"}, {"time": 277400, "text": "that we then split
into tradable cryptocurrency"}, {"time": 280560, "text": "that investors could buy and sell."}, {"time": 283280, "text": "Six months and four law firms later --"}, {"time": 286000, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 287680, "text": "in January 2018,
we launched the very first ICO"}, {"time": 291840, "text": "that represented the value
of nearly 30 companies"}, {"time": 295200, "text": "and an entirely new way to raise capital."}, {"time": 299240, "text": "We got a lot of press."}, {"time": 301000, "text": "My favorite headline about us read,"}, {"time": 303200, "text": ""VCs, read this and weep.""}, {"time": 305480, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 308200, "text": "Our fund was naturally more diverse."}, {"time": 310280, "text": "Twenty percent of the founders were women."}, {"time": 312520, "text": "Fifty percent were international."}, {"time": 314920, "text": "The investors were more excited, too."}, {"time": 317520, "text": "They had a chance to get better returns,"}, {"time": 319480, "text": "because we took out
the middleman fees of venture capital."}, {"time": 322320, "text": "And they could take their money
and reinvest it,"}, {"time": 325320, "text": "potentially funding more new ideas faster."}, {"time": 330160, "text": "I believe this creates
a virtuous cycle of capital"}, {"time": 334800, "text": "that allows many more
entrepreneurs to succeed."}, {"time": 338560, "text": "Because access to capital
is access to opportunity."}, {"time": 342120, "text": "And we have only just begun to imagine"}, {"time": 345120, "text": "what democratizing
access to capital will do."}, {"time": 349560, "text": "I would have never thought
that my own search for funding"}, {"time": 353080, "text": "would lead me to this stage,"}, {"time": 354920, "text": "having helped nearly
30 companies get investment."}, {"time": 359800, "text": "Imagine if other entrepreneurs tried
to invent new ways to access capital"}, {"time": 365560, "text": "rather than following
the traditional route."}, {"time": 368320, "text": "It would change
what gets built, who builds it"}, {"time": 371400, "text": "and the long-term impact on the economy."}, {"time": 374200, "text": "And I believe that's way more exciting"}, {"time": 377160, "text": "than just trying to invest
in the next billion-dollar startup."}, {"time": 380120, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 381360, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: alex_honnold_how_i_climbed_a_3_000_foot_vertical_cliff_without_ropes
speaker: Alex Honnold
title: How I climbed a 3,000-foot vertical cliff — without ropes
transcript:
[{"time": 1520, "text": "Hello. I'd like to show you guys
30 seconds of the best day of my life."}, {"time": 38240, "text": "(Applause)"}, {"time": 44720, "text": "So that was El Capitan
in California's Yosemite National Park,"}, {"time": 48440, "text": "and in case you couldn't tell,"}, {"time": 50000, "text": "I was climbing by myself without a rope,"}, {"time": 52040, "text": "a style of a climbing
known as free soloing."}, {"time": 54720, "text": "That was the culmination
of a nearly decade-long dream,"}, {"time": 57360, "text": "and in the video I'm over
2,500 feet off the ground."}, {"time": 60000, "text": "Seems scary? Yeah, it is,"}, {"time": 62560, "text": "which is why I spent so many years
dreaming about soloing El Cap"}, {"time": 65600, "text": "and not actually doing it."}, {"time": 66880, "text": "But on the day that that video was taken,"}, {"time": 69040, "text": "it didn't feel scary at all."}, {"time": 70640, "text": "It felt as comfortable and natural
as a walk in the park,"}, {"time": 73400, "text": "which is what most folks
were doing in Yosemite that day."}, {"time": 76400, "text": "Today I'd like to talk about
how I was able to feel so comfortable"}, {"time": 79560, "text": "and how I overcame my fear."}, {"time": 80920, "text": "I'll start with a very brief version
of how I became a climber,"}, {"time": 83920, "text": "and then tell the story
of my two most significant free solos."}, {"time": 86880, "text": "They were both successful,
which is why I'm here."}, {"time": 89240, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 91480, "text": "But the first felt largely unsatisfying,"}, {"time": 95000, "text": "whereas the second, El Cap, was by far
the most fulfilling day of my life."}, {"time": 99560, "text": "Through these two climbs,
you'll see my process for managing fear."}, {"time": 103000, "text": "So I started climbing in a gym
when I was around 10 years old,"}, {"time": 105960, "text": "which means that my life
has been centered on climbing"}, {"time": 108520, "text": "for more than 20 years."}, {"time": 109760, "text": "After nearly a decade
of climbing mostly indoors,"}, {"time": 112120, "text": "I made the transition to the outdoors
and gradually started free soloing."}, {"time": 115600, "text": "I built up my comfort over time"}, {"time": 117160, "text": "and slowly took on
bigger and more challenging walls."}, {"time": 119680, "text": "And there have been
many free soloists before me,"}, {"time": 122040, "text": "so I had plenty of
inspiration to draw from."}, {"time": 124160, "text": "But by 2008, I'd repeated
most of their previous solos in Yosemite"}, {"time": 127320, "text": "and was starting to imagine
breaking into new terrain."}, {"time": 129880, "text": "The obvious first choice was Half Dome,"}, {"time": 131800, "text": "an iconic 2,000-foot wall
the lords over the east end of the valley."}, {"time": 135040, "text": "The problem, though also the allure,"}, {"time": 137280, "text": "was that it was too big."}, {"time": 138720, "text": "I didn't really know how to prepare
for a potential free solo."}, {"time": 141680, "text": "So I decided to skip the preparations"}, {"time": 143520, "text": "and just go up there
and have an adventure."}, {"time": 146160, "text": "I figured I would rise to the occasion,"}, {"time": 148080, "text": "which, unsurprisingly,
was not the best strategy."}, {"time": 151880, "text": "I did at least climb the route
roped up with a friend two days before"}, {"time": 155160, "text": "just to make sure
that I knew roughly where to go"}, {"time": 157520, "text": "and that I could physically do it."}, {"time": 159200, "text": "But when I came back
by myself two days later,"}, {"time": 161400, "text": "I decided that I didn't
want to go that way."}, {"time": 163520, "text": "I knew that there was a 300-foot variation"}, {"time": 165560, "text": "that circled around
one of the hardest parts of the climb."}, {"time": 168320, "text": "I suddenly decided to skip the hard part
and take the variation,"}, {"time": 171360, "text": "even though I'd never climbed it before,"}, {"time": 173320, "text": "but I immediately began to doubt myself."}, {"time": 175280, "text": "Imagine being by yourself
in the dead center of a 2,000-foot face,"}, {"time": 178680, "text": "wondering if you're lost."}, {"time": 180600, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 181840, "text": "Thankfully, it was
pretty much the right way"}, {"time": 184160, "text": "and I circled back to the route."}, {"time": 186160, "text": "I was slightly rattled,
I was pretty rattled,"}, {"time": 188720, "text": "but I tried not to let it
bother me too much"}, {"time": 191560, "text": "because I knew that all the hardest
climbing was up at the top."}, {"time": 194560, "text": "I needed to stay composed."}, {"time": 196000, "text": "It was a beautiful September morning,
and as I climbed higher,"}, {"time": 198960, "text": "I could hear the sounds of tourists
chatting and laughing on the summit."}, {"time": 202400, "text": "They'd all hiked up
the normal trail on the back,"}, {"time": 204760, "text": "which I was planning on using
for my descent."}, {"time": 206920, "text": "But between me and the summit
lay a blank slab of granite."}, {"time": 209680, "text": "There were no cracks
or edges to hold on to,"}, {"time": 211800, "text": "just small ripples of texture
up a slightly less than vertical wall."}, {"time": 215040, "text": "I had to trust my life to the friction
between my climbing shoes"}, {"time": 218080, "text": "and the smooth granite."}, {"time": 219400, "text": "I carefully balanced my way upward,"}, {"time": 221120, "text": "shifting my weight back and forth
between the small smears."}, {"time": 223920, "text": "But then I reached a foothold
that I didn't quite trust."}, {"time": 226600, "text": "Two days ago, I'd have just
stepped right up on it,"}, {"time": 229040, "text": "but that would have been with a rope on."}, {"time": 230969, "text": "Now it felt too small and too slippery."}, {"time": 232880, "text": "I doubted that my foot
would stay on if I weighted it."}, {"time": 235440, "text": "I considered a foot further to the side,
which seemed worse."}, {"time": 238320, "text": "I switched my feet and tried
a foot further out."}, {"time": 240600, "text": "It seemed even worse."}, {"time": 241840, "text": "I started to panic."}, {"time": 243080, "text": "I could hear people laughing
on the summit just above me."}, {"time": 245800, "text": "I wanted to be anywhere but on that slab."}, {"time": 247960, "text": "My mind was racing in every direction."}, {"time": 249840, "text": "I knew what I had to do,
but I was too afraid to do it."}, {"time": 252480, "text": "I just had to stand up on my right foot."}, {"time": 254600, "text": "And so after what felt like an eternity,
I accepted what I had to do"}, {"time": 258000, "text": "and I stood up on the right foot,"}, {"time": 259760, "text": "and it didn't slip, and so I didn't die,"}, {"time": 261760, "text": "and that move marked the end
of the hardest climbing."}, {"time": 264280, "text": "And so I charged from there
towards the summit."}, {"time": 266960, "text": "And so normally when you summit Half Dome,"}, {"time": 269040, "text": "you have a rope and a bunch
of climbing gear on you,"}, {"time": 271520, "text": "and tourists gasp and they
flock around you for photos."}, {"time": 274160, "text": "This time I popped over the edge
shirtless, panting, jacked."}, {"time": 277040, "text": "I was amped, but nobody batted an eye."}, {"time": 279120, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 285000, "text": "I looked like a lost hiker
that was too close to the edge."}, {"time": 287760, "text": "I was surrounded by people
talking on cell phones and having picnics."}, {"time": 292760, "text": "I felt like I was in a mall."}, {"time": 294160, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 296320, "text": "I took off my tight climbing shoes
and started hiking back down,"}, {"time": 299360, "text": "and that's when people stopped me."}, {"time": 301040, "text": ""You're hiking barefoot?
That's so hard-core.""}, {"time": 303360, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 310360, "text": "I didn't bother to explain,"}, {"time": 312040, "text": "but that night in my climbing journal,
I duly noted my free solo of Half Dome,"}, {"time": 316920, "text": "but I included a frowny face
and a comment, "Do better?""}, {"time": 321040, "text": "I'd succeeded in the solo"}, {"time": 322400, "text": "and it was celebrated
as a big first in climbing."}, {"time": 324760, "text": "Some friends later made a film about it."}, {"time": 326720, "text": "But I was unsatisfied."}, {"time": 328320, "text": "I was disappointed in my performance,"}, {"time": 330160, "text": "because I knew that I had
gotten away with something."}, {"time": 332680, "text": "I didn't want to be a lucky climber.
I wanted to be a great climber."}, {"time": 335920, "text": "I actually took the next year or so
off from free soloing,"}, {"time": 338680, "text": "because I knew that I shouldn't
make a habit of relying on luck."}, {"time": 341720, "text": "But even though
I wasn't soloing very much,"}, {"time": 343760, "text": "I'd already started to think about El Cap."}, {"time": 345800, "text": "It was always in the back of my mind
as the obvious crown jewel of solos."}, {"time": 349280, "text": "It's the most striking wall in the world."}, {"time": 351640, "text": "Each year, for the next seven years,"}, {"time": 353720, "text": "I'd think, "This is the year
that I'm going to solo El Cap.""}, {"time": 356640, "text": "And then I would drive into Yosemite,
look up at the wall, and think,"}, {"time": 359920, "text": ""No frickin' way.""}, {"time": 361200, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 363080, "text": "It's too big and too scary."}, {"time": 365680, "text": "But eventually I came to accept that
I wanted to test myself against El Cap."}, {"time": 369440, "text": "It represented true mastery,"}, {"time": 371640, "text": "but I needed it to feel different."}, {"time": 373360, "text": "I didn't want to get away with anything
or barely squeak by."}, {"time": 376240, "text": "This time I wanted to do it right."}, {"time": 379280, "text": "The thing that makes El Cap
so intimidating"}, {"time": 381360, "text": "is the sheer scale of the wall."}, {"time": 383000, "text": "Most climbers take three to five days"}, {"time": 384840, "text": "to ascend the 3,000 feet
of vertical granite."}, {"time": 387720, "text": "The idea of setting out
up a wall of that size"}, {"time": 389920, "text": "with nothing but shoes and
a chalk bag seemed impossible."}, {"time": 393240, "text": "3,000 feet of climbing represents"}, {"time": 394880, "text": "thousands of distinct
hand and foot movements,"}, {"time": 397080, "text": "which is a lot to remember."}, {"time": 398440, "text": "Many of the moves I knew
through sheer repetition."}, {"time": 400840, "text": "I'd climbed El Cap maybe 50 times
over the previous decade with a rope."}, {"time": 404440, "text": "But this photo shows my preferred
method of rehearsing the moves."}, {"time": 407560, "text": "I'm on the summit,"}, {"time": 408800, "text": "about to repel down the face
with over a thousand feet of rope"}, {"time": 411746, "text": "to spend the day practicing."}, {"time": 413320, "text": "Once I found sequences
that felt secure and repeatable,"}, {"time": 415916, "text": "I had to memorize them."}, {"time": 417050, "text": "I had to make sure that they were
so deeply ingrained within me"}, {"time": 420036, "text": "that there was no possibility of error."}, {"time": 421950, "text": "I didn't want to be wondering
if I was going the right way"}, {"time": 424880, "text": "or using the best holds."}, {"time": 426120, "text": "I needed everything to feel automatic."}, {"time": 428000, "text": "Climbing with a rope
is a largely physical effort."}, {"time": 430400, "text": "You just have to be strong enough
to hold on and make the movements upward."}, {"time": 434000, "text": "But free soloing
plays out more in the mind."}, {"time": 436120, "text": "The physical effort is largely the same."}, {"time": 438080, "text": "Your body is still climbing the same wall."}, {"time": 440120, "text": "But staying calm
and performing at your best"}, {"time": 442400, "text": "when you know that
any mistake could mean death"}, {"time": 444640, "text": "requires a certain kind of mindset."}, {"time": 446800, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 449400, "text": "That's not supposed to be funny,
but if it is, it is."}, {"time": 451920, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 454200, "text": "I worked to cultivate that mindset
through visualization,"}, {"time": 457000, "text": "which basically just means imagining
the entire experience of soloing the wall."}, {"time": 461200, "text": "Partially, that was to help me
remember all the holds,"}, {"time": 463760, "text": "but mostly visualization
was about feeling the texture"}, {"time": 466320, "text": "of each hold in my hand"}, {"time": 467560, "text": "and imagining the sensation of my leg
reaching out and placing my foot just so."}, {"time": 471320, "text": "I'd imagine it all like a choreographed
dance thousands of feet up."}, {"time": 474920, "text": "The most difficult part of the whole route
was called the Boulder Problem."}, {"time": 478440, "text": "It was about 2,000 feet off the ground"}, {"time": 480320, "text": "and consisted of the hardest
physical moves on the whole route:"}, {"time": 483320, "text": "long pulls between poor handholds
with very small, slippery feet."}, {"time": 486520, "text": "This is what I mean by a poor handhold:"}, {"time": 488440, "text": "an edge smaller than the width
of a pencil but facing downward"}, {"time": 491640, "text": "that I had to press up into with my thumb."}, {"time": 494160, "text": "But that wasn't even the hardest part."}, {"time": 496040, "text": "The crux culminated in a karate kick"}, {"time": 497800, "text": "with my left foot over to the inside
of an adjacent corner,"}, {"time": 500640, "text": "a maneuver that required a high degree
of precision and flexibility,"}, {"time": 503880, "text": "enough so that I'd been doing
a nightly stretching routine"}, {"time": 506640, "text": "for a full year ahead of time"}, {"time": 508080, "text": "to make sure that I could comfortably
make the reach with my leg."}, {"time": 511200, "text": "As I practiced the moves,"}, {"time": 512480, "text": "my visualization turned
to the emotional component"}, {"time": 514919, "text": "of a potential solo."}, {"time": 516400, "text": "Basically, what if I got up there
and it was too scary?"}, {"time": 519200, "text": "What if I was too tired?"}, {"time": 520520, "text": "What if I couldn't quite make the kick?"}, {"time": 522402, "text": "I had to consider every possibility
while I was safely on the ground,"}, {"time": 525680, "text": "so that when the time came and I was
actually making the moves without a rope,"}, {"time": 529400, "text": "there was no room for doubt to creep in."}, {"time": 531360, "text": "Doubt is the precursor to fear,"}, {"time": 532850, "text": "and I knew that I couldn't experience
my perfect moment if I was afraid."}, {"time": 536280, "text": "I had to visualize and rehearse
enough to remove all doubt."}, {"time": 539120, "text": "But beyond that, I also
visualized how it would feel"}, {"time": 541600, "text": "if it never seemed doable."}, {"time": 543360, "text": "What if, after so much work,
I was afraid to try?"}, {"time": 547440, "text": "What if I was wasting my time"}, {"time": 548960, "text": "and I would never feel comfortable
in such an exposed position?"}, {"time": 552320, "text": "There were no easy answers,"}, {"time": 553680, "text": "but El Cap meant enough to me
that I would put in the work and find out."}, {"time": 557440, "text": "Some of my preparations were more mundane."}, {"time": 559680, "text": "This is a photo of my friend Conrad Anker"}, {"time": 561840, "text": "climbing up the bottom of El Cap
with an empty backpack."}, {"time": 564520, "text": "We spent the day climbing together"}, {"time": 566200, "text": "to a specific crack
in the middle of the wall"}, {"time": 568360, "text": "that was choked with loose rocks"}, {"time": 569960, "text": "that made that section
difficult and potentially dangerous,"}, {"time": 572800, "text": "because any missed step
might knock a rock to the ground"}, {"time": 575480, "text": "and kill a passing climber or hiker."}, {"time": 577240, "text": "So we carefully removed the rocks,
loaded them into the pack"}, {"time": 580120, "text": "and rappelled back down."}, {"time": 581400, "text": "Take a second to imagine
how ridiculous it feels"}, {"time": 583680, "text": "to climb 1,500 feet up a wall
just to fill a backpack full of rocks."}, {"time": 586920, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 588560, "text": "It's never that easy to carry
a pack full of rocks around."}, {"time": 591320, "text": "It's even harder on the side of a cliff."}, {"time": 593280, "text": "It may have felt silly,
but it still had to get done."}, {"time": 595800, "text": "I needed everything to feel perfect"}, {"time": 597520, "text": "if I was ever going to climb
the route without a rope."}, {"time": 600120, "text": "After two seasons of working specifically
toward a potential free solo of El Cap,"}, {"time": 603960, "text": "I finally finished all my preparations."}, {"time": 605880, "text": "I knew every handhold
and foothold on the whole route,"}, {"time": 608420, "text": "and I knew exactly what to do."}, {"time": 609880, "text": "Basically, I was ready."}, {"time": 611360, "text": "It was time to solo El Cap."}, {"time": 613640, "text": "On June 3, 2017,"}, {"time": 615960, "text": "I woke up early, ate my usual
breakfast of muesli and fruit"}, {"time": 619200, "text": "and made it to the base
of the wall before sunrise."}, {"time": 621680, "text": "I felt confident as I looked up the wall."}, {"time": 623680, "text": "I felt even better as I started climbing."}, {"time": 626800, "text": "About 500 feet up, I reached a slab"}, {"time": 628600, "text": "very similar to the one that had
given me so much trouble on Half Dome,"}, {"time": 631960, "text": "but this time was different."}, {"time": 633440, "text": "I'd scouted every option, including
hundreds of feet of wall to either side."}, {"time": 637040, "text": "I knew exactly what to do
and how to do it."}, {"time": 639360, "text": "I had no doubts.
I just climbed right through."}, {"time": 642440, "text": "Even the difficult and strenuous
sections passed by with ease."}, {"time": 645560, "text": "I was perfectly executing my routine."}, {"time": 648600, "text": "I rested for a moment
below the Boulder Problem"}, {"time": 650880, "text": "and then climbed it just as I had
practiced so many times with the rope on."}, {"time": 654480, "text": "My foot shot across to the wall
on the left without hesitation,"}, {"time": 657520, "text": "and I knew that I had done it."}, {"time": 660880, "text": "Climbing Half Dome had been a big goal"}, {"time": 662800, "text": "and I did it,"}, {"time": 664040, "text": "but I didn't get what I really wanted."}, {"time": 665920, "text": "I didn't achieve mastery."}, {"time": 667240, "text": "I was hesitant and afraid, and it wasn't
the experience that I wanted."}, {"time": 670920, "text": "But El Cap was different."}, {"time": 672600, "text": "With 600 feet to go, I felt like the
mountain was offering me a victory lap."}, {"time": 676360, "text": "I climbed with a smooth precision"}, {"time": 678000, "text": "and enjoyed the sounds of the birds
swooping around the cliff."}, {"time": 680960, "text": "It all felt like a celebration."}, {"time": 682480, "text": "And then I reached the summit"}, {"time": 683920, "text": "after three hours and 56 minutes
of glorious climbing."}, {"time": 686480, "text": "It was the climb that I wanted,
and it felt like mastery."}, {"time": 689200, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 690440, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: melinda_epler_3_ways_to_advocate_for_a_more_inclusive_workplace
speaker: Melinda Epler
title: 3 ways to be a better ally in the workplace
transcript:
[{"time": 640, "text": "In 2013, I was an executive
at an international engineering firm"}, {"time": 4960, "text": "in San Francisco."}, {"time": 6360, "text": "It was my dream job."}, {"time": 7960, "text": "A culmination of all the skills
that I've acquired over the years:"}, {"time": 11280, "text": "storytelling, social impact,
behavior change."}, {"time": 14320, "text": "I was the head of marketing and culture"}, {"time": 16239, "text": "and I worked with the nation's
largest health care systems,"}, {"time": 19240, "text": "using technology and culture change"}, {"time": 21360, "text": "to radically reduce
their energy and water use"}, {"time": 24080, "text": "and to improve their social impact."}, {"time": 26280, "text": "I was creating real change in the world."}, {"time": 29720, "text": "And it was the worst
professional experience of my life."}, {"time": 36120, "text": "I hit the glass ceiling hard."}, {"time": 38560, "text": "It hurt like hell."}, {"time": 42200, "text": "While there were bigger issues,"}, {"time": 43720, "text": "most of what happened
were little behaviors and patterns"}, {"time": 47720, "text": "that slowly chipped away
at my ability to do my work well."}, {"time": 51800, "text": "They ate away at my confidence,
my leadership, my capacity to innovate."}, {"time": 56920, "text": "For example, my first
presentation at the company."}, {"time": 59880, "text": "I walk up to the front of the room"}, {"time": 61560, "text": "to give a presentation on the strategy
that I believe is right for the company."}, {"time": 65360, "text": "The one they hired me to create."}, {"time": 66960, "text": "And I look around the room
at my fellow executives."}, {"time": 69480, "text": "And I watch as they
pick up their cell phones"}, {"time": 71760, "text": "and look down at their laptops."}, {"time": 74040, "text": "They're not paying attention."}, {"time": 76000, "text": "As soon as I start to speak,
the interruptions begin"}, {"time": 78520, "text": "and people talk over me
again and again and again."}, {"time": 82480, "text": "Some of my ideas are flat out dismissed"}, {"time": 86040, "text": "and then brought up
by somebody else and championed."}, {"time": 91640, "text": "I was the only woman in that room."}, {"time": 94000, "text": "And I could have used an ally."}, {"time": 96680, "text": "Little behaviors and pattern like this,
every day, again and again,"}, {"time": 100440, "text": "they wear you down."}, {"time": 102480, "text": "Pretty soon, my energy
was absolutely tapped."}, {"time": 106360, "text": "At a real low point, I read an article"}, {"time": 108480, "text": "about toxic workplace culture
and microaggressions."}, {"time": 111960, "text": "Microaggressions --
everyday slights, insults,"}, {"time": 115040, "text": "negative verbal
and nonverbal communication,"}, {"time": 117400, "text": "whether intentional or not,"}, {"time": 119120, "text": "that impede your ability
to do your work well."}, {"time": 122400, "text": "That sounded familiar."}, {"time": 124280, "text": "I started to realize
that I wasn't failing."}, {"time": 128000, "text": "The culture around me was failing me."}, {"time": 131920, "text": "And I wasn't alone."}, {"time": 133480, "text": "Behaviors and patterns like this"}, {"time": 135120, "text": "every day affect underrepresented people
of all backgrounds in the workplace."}, {"time": 139520, "text": "And that has a real impact"}, {"time": 142760, "text": "on our colleagues, on our companies"}, {"time": 145040, "text": "and our collective capacity to innovate."}, {"time": 149680, "text": "So, in the tech industry,
we want quick solutions."}, {"time": 152760, "text": "But there is no magic wand
for correcting diversity and inclusion."}, {"time": 157000, "text": "Change happens one person at a time,"}, {"time": 159160, "text": "one act at a time, one word at a time."}, {"time": 163240, "text": "We make a mistake
when we see diversity and inclusion"}, {"time": 166240, "text": "as that side project over there
the diversity people are working on,"}, {"time": 170600, "text": "rather than this work inside all of us
that we need to do together."}, {"time": 175600, "text": "And that work begins"}, {"time": 177280, "text": "with unlearning what we know
about success and opportunity."}, {"time": 181400, "text": "We've been told our whole lives"}, {"time": 183360, "text": "that if we work hard,
that hard work pays off,"}, {"time": 185640, "text": "we'd get what we deserve,
we'd live our dream."}, {"time": 189080, "text": "But that isn't true for everyone."}, {"time": 191280, "text": "Some people have to work 10 times as hard"}, {"time": 193280, "text": "to get to the same place"}, {"time": 195000, "text": "due to many barriers
put in front of them by society."}, {"time": 198560, "text": "Your gender, your race, your ethnicity,"}, {"time": 200800, "text": "your religion, your disability,
your sexual orientation,"}, {"time": 204000, "text": "your class, your geography,"}, {"time": 206240, "text": "all of these can give you more
of fewer opportunities for success."}, {"time": 210320, "text": "And that's where allyship comes in."}, {"time": 212680, "text": "Allyship is about understanding
that imbalance in opportunity"}, {"time": 216320, "text": "and working to correct it."}, {"time": 218440, "text": "Allyship is really seeing
the person next to us."}, {"time": 221960, "text": "And the person missing,
who should be standing next to us."}, {"time": 225480, "text": "And first, just knowing
what they're going through."}, {"time": 228200, "text": "And then, helping them succeed
and thrive with us."}, {"time": 233400, "text": "When we work together to develop
more diverse and inclusive teams,"}, {"time": 236840, "text": "data shows we will be more innovative,
more productive and more profitable."}, {"time": 241680, "text": "So, who is an ally?"}, {"time": 243000, "text": "All of us."}, {"time": 244240, "text": "We can all be allies for each other."}, {"time": 245960, "text": "As a white, cisgendered woman
in the United States,"}, {"time": 248480, "text": "there are many ways I'm very privileged."}, {"time": 250520, "text": "And some ways I'm not."}, {"time": 252640, "text": "And I work hard every day"}, {"time": 253920, "text": "to be an ally for people
with less privilege than me."}, {"time": 256680, "text": "And I still need allies, too."}, {"time": 260240, "text": "In the tech industry,
like in many industries,"}, {"time": 263480, "text": "there are many people
who are underrepresented,"}, {"time": 265680, "text": "or face barriers and discrimination."}, {"time": 268320, "text": "Women, people who are nonbinary --"}, {"time": 270400, "text": "so people who don't necessarily
identify as man or woman --"}, {"time": 273520, "text": "racial and ethnic minorities,"}, {"time": 275200, "text": "LGBTQIA, people
with disabilities, veterans,"}, {"time": 278560, "text": "anybody over age 35."}, {"time": 280760, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 285040, "text": "We have a major bias toward youth
in the tech industry."}, {"time": 288520, "text": "And many others."}, {"time": 289760, "text": "There is always someone
with less privilege than you."}, {"time": 293000, "text": "On this stage, in this room."}, {"time": 295440, "text": "At your company, on your team,
in your city or town."}, {"time": 300440, "text": "So, people are allies
for different reasons."}, {"time": 302960, "text": "Find your reason."}, {"time": 304440, "text": "It could be for the business case,"}, {"time": 306120, "text": "because data shows
diverse and inclusive teams"}, {"time": 308800, "text": "will be more productive,
more profitable and more innovative."}, {"time": 312360, "text": "It could be for fairness
and social justice."}, {"time": 315720, "text": "Because we have a long history
of oppression and inequity"}, {"time": 319720, "text": "that we need to work on together."}, {"time": 323640, "text": "Or it could be for your kids,"}, {"time": 325080, "text": "so your kids grow up
with equal opportunities."}, {"time": 328680, "text": "And they grow up creating
equal opportunities for others."}, {"time": 332520, "text": "Find your reason."}, {"time": 334040, "text": "For me, it's all three."}, {"time": 335280, "text": "Find your reason and step up
to be there for someone who needs you."}, {"time": 340400, "text": "So, what can you do as an ally?"}, {"time": 342400, "text": "Start by doing no harm."}, {"time": 344760, "text": "It's our job as allies to know what
microaggressions are and to not do them."}, {"time": 349840, "text": "It's our job as allies
to listen, to learn,"}, {"time": 353240, "text": "to unlearn and to relearn,"}, {"time": 355920, "text": "and to make mistakes and to keep learning."}, {"time": 360240, "text": "Give me your full attention."}, {"time": 363840, "text": "Close your laptops,"}, {"time": 365160, "text": "put down your cellphones
and pay attention."}, {"time": 368520, "text": "If somebody is new or the only
person in the room like them,"}, {"time": 371480, "text": "or they're just nervous,"}, {"time": 372760, "text": "this is going to make a huge difference
in how they show up."}, {"time": 376160, "text": "Don't interrupt."}, {"time": 377400, "text": "Underrepresented people
are more likely to be interrupted,"}, {"time": 380160, "text": "so just take a step back and listen."}, {"time": 383000, "text": "Echo and attribute."}, {"time": 385040, "text": "If I have a great idea,"}, {"time": 386800, "text": "echo my idea and then attribute it to me,
and we thrive together."}, {"time": 392040, "text": "Learn the language I use
to describe my identity."}, {"time": 395320, "text": "Know how to pronounce my name."}, {"time": 397360, "text": "Know my pronouns -- he, she, they."}, {"time": 400680, "text": "Know the language I use to describe
my disability, my ethnicity, my religion."}, {"time": 406520, "text": "This really matters to people,
so if you don't know, just ask."}, {"time": 412360, "text": "Listen and learn."}, {"time": 415200, "text": "An executive told me recently
that after doing allyship on his team,"}, {"time": 420400, "text": "the whole team started to normalize
calling themselves out and each other out"}, {"time": 424600, "text": "for interrupting."}, {"time": 426720, "text": ""I'm so sorry I'm interrupting
you right now, carry on.""}, {"time": 430720, "text": ""Hey, she's got
a great idea, let's listen.""}, {"time": 435320, "text": "Number two, advocate
for underrepresented people in small ways."}, {"time": 439080, "text": "Intervene; you can change
the power dynamics in the room."}, {"time": 442200, "text": "If you see somebody is the only
person in the room like them"}, {"time": 445760, "text": "and they are being belittled,
they are being interrupted,"}, {"time": 448440, "text": "do something, say something."}, {"time": 451680, "text": "Invite underrepresented people to speak."}, {"time": 453960, "text": "And say no to panels
without underrepresented speakers."}, {"time": 459800, "text": "Refer someone for a job"}, {"time": 461280, "text": "and encourage them to take that job
and to take new opportunities."}, {"time": 465360, "text": "And this one's really important --
help normalize allyship."}, {"time": 468840, "text": "If you're a person with privilege,"}, {"time": 470720, "text": "it's easier for you
to advocate for allies."}, {"time": 473440, "text": "So use that privilege to create change."}, {"time": 477160, "text": "Three, change someone's
life significantly."}, {"time": 480120, "text": "So, be there for somebody
throughout their career."}, {"time": 483200, "text": "Mentor or sponsor them,
give them opportunities as they grow."}, {"time": 487720, "text": "Volunteer -- volunteer for a STEM program,
serving underserved youth."}, {"time": 491960, "text": "Transform your team
to be more diverse and inclusive."}, {"time": 494480, "text": "And make real commitments
to creating change here."}, {"time": 497600, "text": "Hold yourself and your team
accountable for creating change."}, {"time": 502160, "text": "And lastly,"}, {"time": 503640, "text": "help advocate for change
across your company."}, {"time": 506680, "text": "When companies teach
their people to be allies,"}, {"time": 509080, "text": "diversity and inclusion
programs are stronger."}, {"time": 512000, "text": "You and I can be allies for each other,"}, {"time": 514159, "text": "whether we're inside or outside of work."}, {"time": 520320, "text": "So, I realized recently"}, {"time": 524480, "text": "that I still have lingering shame and fear"}, {"time": 527840, "text": "from that moment in my career
when I felt utterly alone,"}, {"time": 531200, "text": "shut out and unsupported."}, {"time": 534320, "text": "There are millions of people out there,
like me, right now, feeling that way."}, {"time": 538040, "text": "And it doesn't take much
for us to be there for each other."}, {"time": 541320, "text": "And when we're there for each other,
when we support one another,"}, {"time": 544400, "text": "we thrive together."}, {"time": 545960, "text": "And when we thrive, we build better teams,"}, {"time": 548960, "text": "better products and better companies."}, {"time": 552680, "text": "Allyship is powerful."}, {"time": 555600, "text": "Try it."}, {"time": 557760, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 559200, "text": "(Applause)"}]

name: christine_porath_why_being_nice_to_your_coworkers_is_good_for_business
speaker: Christine Porath
title: Why being respectful to your coworkers is good for business
transcript:
[{"time": 927, "text": "Who do you want to be?"}, {"time": 3317, "text": "It's a simple question,"}, {"time": 5319, "text": "and whether you know it or not,"}, {"time": 7095, "text": "you're answering it every day
through your actions."}, {"time": 10971, "text": "This one question will define
your professional success"}, {"time": 15468, "text": "more than any other,"}, {"time": 17516, "text": "because how you show up
and treat people means everything."}, {"time": 22116, "text": "Either you lift people up
by respecting them,"}, {"time": 26342, "text": "making them feel valued,
appreciated and heard,"}, {"time": 31029, "text": "or you hold people down
by making them feel small,"}, {"time": 35994, "text": "insulted, disregarded or excluded."}, {"time": 40314, "text": "And who you choose to be means everything."}, {"time": 44631, "text": "I study the effects
of incivility on people."}, {"time": 47628, "text": "What is incivility?"}, {"time": 49337, "text": "It's disrespect or rudeness."}, {"time": 51620, "text": "It includes a lot of different behaviors,"}, {"time": 54006, "text": "from mocking or belittling someone"}, {"time": 56384, "text": "to teasing people in ways that sting"}, {"time": 58947, "text": "to telling offensive jokes"}, {"time": 60830, "text": "to texting in meetings."}, {"time": 62663, "text": "And what's uncivil to one person
may be absolutely fine to another."}, {"time": 67414, "text": "Take texting while someone's
speaking to you."}, {"time": 70106, "text": "Some of us may find it rude,"}, {"time": 72292, "text": "others may think it's absolutely civil."}, {"time": 75171, "text": "So it really depends."}, {"time": 76855, "text": "It's all in the eyes of the beholder
and whether that person felt disrespected."}, {"time": 82748, "text": "We may not mean to make
someone feel that way,"}, {"time": 85561, "text": "but when we do, it has consequences."}, {"time": 89736, "text": "Over 22 years ago,"}, {"time": 91654, "text": "I vividly recall walking into
this stuffy hospital room."}, {"time": 95901, "text": "It was heartbreaking to see my dad,
this strong, athletic, energetic guy,"}, {"time": 101943, "text": "lying in the bed with electrodes
strapped to his bare chest."}, {"time": 106548, "text": "What put him there
was work-related stress."}, {"time": 110033, "text": "For over a decade,"}, {"time": 112075, "text": "he suffered an uncivil boss."}, {"time": 117244, "text": "And for me, I thought he was
just an outlier at that time."}, {"time": 122382, "text": "But just a couple years later,"}, {"time": 124892, "text": "I witnessed and experienced
a lot of incivility"}, {"time": 127806, "text": "in my first job out of college."}, {"time": 130441, "text": "I spent a year going to work every day"}, {"time": 132886, "text": "and hearing things from coworkers like,"}, {"time": 135251, "text": ""Are you an idiot?
That's not how it's done,""}, {"time": 138493, "text": "and, "If I wanted your opinion, I'd ask.""}, {"time": 143025, "text": "So I did the natural thing."}, {"time": 145862, "text": "I quit, and I went back to grad school
to study the effects of this."}, {"time": 150437, "text": "There, I met Christine Pearson."}, {"time": 153218, "text": "And she had a theory
that small, uncivil actions"}, {"time": 156894, "text": "can lead to much bigger problems"}, {"time": 159306, "text": "like aggression and violence."}, {"time": 161908, "text": "We believed that incivility affected
performance and the bottom line."}, {"time": 165920, "text": "So we launched a study,
and what we found was eye-opening."}, {"time": 170383, "text": "We sent a survey to business school alumni"}, {"time": 173077, "text": "working in all different organizations."}, {"time": 175492, "text": "We asked them to write a few sentences"}, {"time": 177991, "text": "about one experience
where they were treated rudely,"}, {"time": 181029, "text": "disrespectfully or insensitively,"}, {"time": 183643, "text": "and to answer questions
about how they reacted."}, {"time": 188621, "text": "One person told us about a boss
that made insulting statements like,"}, {"time": 192417, "text": ""That's kindergartner's work,""}, {"time": 194772, "text": "and another tore up someone's work
in front of the entire team."}, {"time": 199751, "text": "And what we found is that incivility
made people less motivated:"}, {"time": 204180, "text": "66 percent cut back work efforts,"}, {"time": 207443, "text": "80 percent lost time
worrying about what happened,"}, {"time": 210486, "text": "and 12 percent left their job."}, {"time": 214506, "text": "And after we published these results,
two things happened."}, {"time": 218201, "text": "One, we got calls from organizations."}, {"time": 221503, "text": "Cisco read about these numbers,"}, {"time": 223305, "text": "took just a few of these
and estimated, conservatively,"}, {"time": 227873, "text": "that incivility was costing them
12 million dollars a year."}, {"time": 231961, "text": "The second thing that happened was,
we heard from others in our academic field"}, {"time": 236725, "text": "who said, "Well, people are reporting
this, but how can you really show it?"}, {"time": 241393, "text": "Does people's performance really suffer?""}, {"time": 244711, "text": "I was curious about that, too."}, {"time": 247046, "text": "With Amir Erez, I compared
those that experienced incivility"}, {"time": 251312, "text": "to those that didn't
experience incivility."}, {"time": 254112, "text": "And what we found is that those
that experience incivility"}, {"time": 257815, "text": "do actually function much worse."}, {"time": 261571, "text": ""OK," you may say. "This makes sense."}, {"time": 264007, "text": "After all, it's natural
that their performance suffers.""}, {"time": 268394, "text": "But what about if you're not
the one who experiences it?"}, {"time": 272202, "text": "What if you just see or hear it?"}, {"time": 274855, "text": "You're a witness."}, {"time": 276380, "text": "We wondered if it affected witnesses, too."}, {"time": 279809, "text": "So we conducted studies"}, {"time": 281104, "text": "where five participants would witness
an experimenter act rudely"}, {"time": 284725, "text": "to someone who arrived late to the study."}, {"time": 287678, "text": "The experimenter said,
"What is it with you?"}, {"time": 290406, "text": "You arrive late, you're irresponsible."}, {"time": 292708, "text": "Look at you! How do you expect
to hold a job in the real world?""}, {"time": 297008, "text": "And in another study in a small group,"}, {"time": 299293, "text": "we tested the effects of a peer
insulting a group member."}, {"time": 303442, "text": "Now, what we found was really interesting,"}, {"time": 305849, "text": "because witnesses'
performance decreased, too --"}, {"time": 308541, "text": "and not just marginally,
quite significantly."}, {"time": 314159, "text": "Incivility is a bug."}, {"time": 316576, "text": "It's contagious,"}, {"time": 318221, "text": "and we become carriers of it
just by being around it."}, {"time": 322525, "text": "And this isn't confined to the workplace."}, {"time": 325136, "text": "We can catch this virus anywhere --"}, {"time": 327681, "text": "at home, online, in schools
and in our communities."}, {"time": 333069, "text": "It affects our emotions,
our motivation, our performance"}, {"time": 337612, "text": "and how we treat others."}, {"time": 339531, "text": "It even affects our attention
and can take some of our brainpower."}, {"time": 344283, "text": "And this happens not only
if we experience incivility"}, {"time": 347883, "text": "or we witness it."}, {"time": 349452, "text": "It can happen even if we
just see or read rude words."}, {"time": 354029, "text": "Let me give you an example of what I mean."}, {"time": 357424, "text": "To test this, we gave people
combinations of words"}, {"time": 360547, "text": "to use to make a sentence."}, {"time": 362591, "text": "But we were very sneaky."}, {"time": 364850, "text": "Half the participants got a list
with 15 words used to trigger rudeness:"}, {"time": 370357, "text": "impolitely, interrupt, obnoxious, bother."}, {"time": 375414, "text": "Half the participants
received a list of words"}, {"time": 378153, "text": "with none of these rude triggers."}, {"time": 380950, "text": "And what we found was really surprising,"}, {"time": 383738, "text": "because the people who got the rude words"}, {"time": 386162, "text": "were five times more likely to miss
information right in front of them"}, {"time": 390497, "text": "on the computer screen."}, {"time": 392671, "text": "And as we continued this research,"}, {"time": 394765, "text": "what we found is that those
that read the rude words"}, {"time": 398145, "text": "took longer to make decisions,"}, {"time": 400129, "text": "to record their decisions,"}, {"time": 401897, "text": "and they made significantly more errors."}, {"time": 405263, "text": "This can be a big deal,"}, {"time": 406999, "text": "especially when it comes
to life-and-death situations."}, {"time": 410887, "text": "Steve, a physician, told me
about a doctor that he worked with"}, {"time": 414670, "text": "who was never very respectful,"}, {"time": 416420, "text": "especially to junior staff and nurses."}, {"time": 419381, "text": "But Steve told me about
this one particular interaction"}, {"time": 422808, "text": "where this doctor shouted
at a medical team."}, {"time": 426544, "text": "Right after the interaction,"}, {"time": 428361, "text": "the team gave the wrong dosage
of medication to their patient."}, {"time": 433289, "text": "Steve said the information
was right there on the chart,"}, {"time": 437144, "text": "but somehow everyone
on the team missed it."}, {"time": 441307, "text": "He said they lacked the attention
or awareness to take it into account."}, {"time": 445698, "text": "Simple mistake, right?"}, {"time": 447803, "text": "Well, that patient died."}, {"time": 450462, "text": "Researchers in Israel have actually shown"}, {"time": 453664, "text": "that medical teams exposed to rudeness"}, {"time": 456173, "text": "perform worse not only
in all their diagnostics,"}, {"time": 459630, "text": "but in all the procedures they did."}, {"time": 462607, "text": "This was mainly because
the teams exposed to rudeness"}, {"time": 465799, "text": "didn't share information as readily,"}, {"time": 468251, "text": "and they stopped seeking
help from their teammates."}, {"time": 471128, "text": "And I see this not only in medicine
but in all industries."}, {"time": 476581, "text": "So if incivility has such a huge cost,"}, {"time": 479659, "text": "why do we still see so much of it?"}, {"time": 482636, "text": "I was curious, so we surveyed
people about this, too."}, {"time": 486068, "text": "The number one reason is stress."}, {"time": 488958, "text": "People feel overwhelmed."}, {"time": 491849, "text": "The other reason that people
are not more civil"}, {"time": 494552, "text": "is because they're skeptical
and even concerned"}, {"time": 497350, "text": "about being civil or appearing nice."}, {"time": 500004, "text": "They believe they'll appear
less leader-like."}, {"time": 502551, "text": "They wonder: Do nice guys finish last?"}, {"time": 506042, "text": "Or in other words: Do jerks get ahead?"}, {"time": 509000, "text": "(Laughter)"}, {"time": 511088, "text": "It's easy to think so,"}, {"time": 512600, "text": "especially when we see
a few prominent examples"}, {"time": 515549, "text": "that dominate the conversation."}, {"time": 518466, "text": "Well, it turns out,
in the long run, they don't."}, {"time": 522063, "text": "There's really rich research on this
by Morgan McCall and Michael Lombardo"}, {"time": 526063, "text": "when they were at
the Center for Creative Leadership."}, {"time": 528726, "text": "They found that the number one reason
tied to executive failure"}, {"time": 533559, "text": "was an insensitive, abrasive
or bullying style."}, {"time": 538428, "text": "There will always be some outliers
that succeed despite their incivility."}, {"time": 542818, "text": "Sooner or later, though,"}, {"time": 544405, "text": "most uncivil people
sabotage their success."}, {"time": 548217, "text": "For example, with uncivil executives,"}, {"time": 550234, "text": "it comes back to hurt them
when they're in a place of weakness"}, {"time": 553306, "text": "or they need something."}, {"time": 554747, "text": "People won't have their backs."}, {"time": 557795, "text": "But what about nice guys?"}, {"time": 559740, "text": "Does civility pay?"}, {"time": 561413, "text": "Yes, it does."}, {"time": 563853, "text": "And being civil doesn't just mean
that you're not a jerk."}, {"time": 568288, "text": "Not holding someone down
isn't the same as lifting them up."}, {"time": 572605, "text": "Being truly civil means
doing the small things,"}, {"time": 575864, "text": "like smiling and saying
hello in the hallway,"}, {"time": 578938, "text": "listening fully when
someone's speaking to you."}, {"time": 582260, "text": "Now, you can have strong opinions,"}, {"time": 584315, "text": "disagree, have conflict
or give negative feedback civilly,"}, {"time": 589358, "text": "with respect."}, {"time": 590870, "text": "Some people call it "radical candor,""}, {"time": 593306, "text": "where you care personally,"}, {"time": 594818, "text": "but you challenge directly."}, {"time": 597612, "text": "So yes, civility pays."}, {"time": 600474, "text": "In a biotechnology firm,
colleagues and I found"}, {"time": 603393, "text": "that those that were seen as civil"}, {"time": 605492, "text": "were twice as likely
to be viewed as leaders,"}, {"time": 608153, "text": "and they performed significantly better."}, {"time": 611066, "text": "Why does civility pay?"}, {"time": 613067, "text": "Because people see you
as an important -- and a powerful --"}, {"time": 617839, "text": "unique combination
of two key characteristics:"}, {"time": 621566, "text": "warm and competent, friendly and smart."}, {"time": 625184, "text": "In other words, being civil
isn't just about motivating others."}, {"time": 629708, "text": "It's about you."}, {"time": 631643, "text": "If you're civil, you're more likely
to be seen as a leader."}, {"time": 635174, "text": "You'll perform better, and you're seen
as warm and competent."}, {"time": 639722, "text": "But there's an even bigger story
about how civility pays,"}, {"time": 643454, "text": "and it ties to one of the most
important questions around leadership:"}, {"time": 648234, "text": "What do people want most
from their leaders?"}, {"time": 651993, "text": "We took data from over
20,000 employees around the world,"}, {"time": 655730, "text": "and we found the answer was simple:"}, {"time": 658933, "text": "respect."}, {"time": 660711, "text": "Being treated with respect
was more important"}, {"time": 663941, "text": "than recognition and appreciation,"}, {"time": 666461, "text": "useful feedback,"}, {"time": 668040, "text": "even opportunities for learning."}, {"time": 670675, "text": "Those that felt respected were healthier,"}, {"time": 674406, "text": "more focused,"}, {"time": 675805, "text": "more likely to stay
with their organization"}, {"time": 678335, "text": "and far more engaged."}, {"time": 682123, "text": "So where do you start?"}, {"time": 684219, "text": "How can you lift people up
and make people feel respected?"}, {"time": 688411, "text": "Well, the nice thing is,
it doesn't require a huge shift."}, {"time": 691977, "text": "Small things can make a big difference."}, {"time": 695108, "text": "I found that thanking people,"}, {"time": 697790, "text": "sharing credit,"}, {"time": 699280, "text": "listening attentively,"}, {"time": 701663, "text": "humbly asking questions,"}, {"time": 704116, "text": "acknowledging others and smiling"}, {"time": 706855, "text": "has an impact."}, {"time": 709497, "text": "Patrick Quinlan, former CEO
of Ochsner Health [System],"}, {"time": 713256, "text": "told me about the effects
of their 10-5 way,"}, {"time": 716137, "text": "where if you're within 10 feet of someone,"}, {"time": 718419, "text": "you make eye contact and smile,"}, {"time": 721093, "text": "and if you're within five feet,"}, {"time": 722789, "text": "you say hello."}, {"time": 724721, "text": "He explained that civility spread,"}, {"time": 727405, "text": "patient satisfaction scores rose,"}, {"time": 729835, "text": "as did patient referrals."}, {"time": 732916, "text": "Civility and respect can be used
to boost an organization's performance."}, {"time": 737808, "text": "When my friend Doug Conant took over
as CEO of Campbell's Soup Company in 2001,"}, {"time": 743580, "text": "the company's market share
had just dropped in half."}, {"time": 746531, "text": "Sales were declining,"}, {"time": 748230, "text": "lots of people had just been laid off."}, {"time": 750863, "text": "A Gallup manager said it was
the least engaged organization"}, {"time": 754711, "text": "that they had surveyed."}, {"time": 756969, "text": "And as Doug drove up
to work his first day,"}, {"time": 759918, "text": "he noticed that the headquarters
was surrounded by barbwire fence."}, {"time": 764313, "text": "There were guard towers
in the parking lot."}, {"time": 767775, "text": "He said it looked like
a minimum security prison."}, {"time": 771436, "text": "It felt toxic."}, {"time": 774771, "text": "Within five years, Doug
had turned things around."}, {"time": 778182, "text": "And within nine years, they were setting
all-time performance records"}, {"time": 781764, "text": "and racking up awards,
including best place to work."}, {"time": 785449, "text": "How did he do it?"}, {"time": 787416, "text": "On day one, Doug told employees"}, {"time": 789867, "text": "that he was going to have
high standards for performance,"}, {"time": 792558, "text": "but they were going
to do it with civility."}, {"time": 794667, "text": "He walked the talk,
and he expected his leaders to."}, {"time": 798805, "text": "For Doug, it all came down
to being tough-minded on standards"}, {"time": 803544, "text": "and tenderhearted with people."}, {"time": 806119, "text": "For him, he said it was all about
these touch points,"}, {"time": 809356, "text": "or these daily interactions
