the right technology to make them talk."}, {"time": 82006, "text": "So let me take you on a journey
of unthinkable capabilities."}, {"time": 90528, "text": "Katie has been raped"}, {"time": 93762, "text": "and her lifeless body has been found
in the woods three days later,"}, {"time": 98362, "text": "after her disappearance."}, {"time": 100577, "text": "The police is targeting three suspects,"}, {"time": 103111, "text": "having narrowed down
the search from over 20 men"}, {"time": 107038, "text": "who had been seen
in that area on the same day."}, {"time": 110914, "text": "The only piece of evidence"}, {"time": 112745, "text": "is two very faint,
overlapping fingerprints"}, {"time": 117399, "text": "on the tape that was found
wrapped around Katie's neck."}, {"time": 121912, "text": "Often, faint and overlapping fingerprints
cannot help the police"}, {"time": 126572, "text": "to make an identification."}, {"time": 128539, "text": "And until recently,
this might have been the end of the road,"}, {"time": 133886, "text": "but this is where
we can make the difference."}, {"time": 137109, "text": "The tape is sent to our labs,"}, {"time": 139888, "text": "where we're asked to use
our cutting-edge technology"}, {"time": 142872, "text": "to help with the investigation."}, {"time": 146032, "text": "And here, we use an existing form"}, {"time": 148643, "text": "of mass spectrometry imaging technology"}, {"time": 153327, "text": "that we have further developed and adapted"}, {"time": 155914, "text": "specifically for the molecular and imaging
analysis of fingerprints."}, {"time": 161936, "text": "In essence, we fire
a UV laser at the print,"}, {"time": 165945, "text": "and we cause the desorption
of the molecules from the print,"}, {"time": 169826, "text": "ready to be captured
by the mass spectrometer."}, {"time": 173708, "text": "Mass spectrometry measures
the weight of the molecules --"}, {"time": 177033, "text": "or as we say, the mass --"}, {"time": 179351, "text": "and those numbers that you see there,
they indicate that mass."}, {"time": 183893, "text": "But more crucially,"}, {"time": 185555, "text": "they indicate who those molecules are --"}, {"time": 190034, "text": "whether I'm seeing paracetamol"}, {"time": 192175, "text": "or something more sinister,
forensically speaking."}, {"time": 196734, "text": "We applied this technology
to the evidence that we have"}, {"time": 199774, "text": "and we found the presence
of condom lubricants."}, {"time": 204337, "text": "In fact, we've developed protocols
that enable us to even suggest"}, {"time": 208989, "text": "what brand of condom might have been used."}, {"time": 213097, "text": "So we pass this information to the police,"}, {"time": 215208, "text": "who, meanwhile,
have obtained a search warrant"}, {"time": 218638, "text": "and they found the same brand
of condom in Dalton's premises."}, {"time": 225199, "text": "And with Dalton and Thomson
also having records for sexual assaults,"}, {"time": 230651, "text": "then it is Chapman that may become
the less likely suspect."}, {"time": 236028, "text": "But is this information
enough to make an arrest?"}, {"time": 239533, "text": "Of course not,"}, {"time": 240708, "text": "and we are asked to delve deeper
with our investigation."}, {"time": 244225, "text": "So we found out, also, the presence
of other two very interesting molecules."}, {"time": 249609, "text": "One is an antidepressant,"}, {"time": 252077, "text": "and one is a very special molecule."}, {"time": 254123, "text": "It only forms in your body"}, {"time": 256272, "text": "if you drink alcohol
and consume cocaine at the same time."}, {"time": 260719, "text": "And alcohol is known to potentiate
the effects of cocaine,"}, {"time": 264593, "text": "so here, we now have a hint
on the state of mind"}, {"time": 269381, "text": "of the individual
whilst perpetrating the crime."}, {"time": 273198, "text": "We passed this information to the police,"}, {"time": 276200, "text": "and they found out that, actually,
Thomson is a drug addict,"}, {"time": 280508, "text": "and he also has a medical record
for psychotic episodes,"}, {"time": 284762, "text": "for which presumably
the antidepressant was prescribed."}, {"time": 289016, "text": "So now Thomson becomes
the more likely suspect."}, {"time": 295463, "text": "But the reality is that I still don't know
where these molecules are coming from,"}, {"time": 300980, "text": "from which fingerprint,"}, {"time": 302750, "text": "and who those two fingerprints belong to."}, {"time": 306346, "text": "Fear not."}, {"time": 307641, "text": "Mass spectrometry imaging
can help us further."}, {"time": 310763, "text": "In fact, the technology is so powerful"}, {"time": 314032, "text": "that we can see where
these molecules are on a fingerprint."}, {"time": 319821, "text": "Like you see in this video,"}, {"time": 321896, "text": "every single one of those peaks
corresponds to a mass,"}, {"time": 325798, "text": "every mass to a molecule,"}, {"time": 327894, "text": "and we can interrogate the software,
by selecting each of those molecules,"}, {"time": 332859, "text": "as to where they are present
on a fingermark."}, {"time": 337385, "text": "And some images are not very revealing,"}, {"time": 340482, "text": "some are better,"}, {"time": 341973, "text": "some are really good."}, {"time": 344459, "text": "And we can create multiple images
of the same mark --"}, {"time": 349475, "text": "in theory, hundreds of images
of the same fingerprint --"}, {"time": 353586, "text": "for as many of the molecules
that we have detected."}, {"time": 357547, "text": "So step one ..."}, {"time": 360262, "text": "for overlapping fingerprints, chances are,"}, {"time": 364271, "text": "especially if they come
from different individuals,"}, {"time": 366816, "text": "that the molecular composition
is not identical,"}, {"time": 370259, "text": "so let's ask the software
to visualize those unique molecules"}, {"time": 375366, "text": "just present in one fingermark
and not in the other one."}, {"time": 379875, "text": "By doing so,"}, {"time": 381584, "text": "that's how we can separate
the two ridge patterns."}, {"time": 386490, "text": "And this is really important"}, {"time": 388489, "text": "because the police now are able
to identify one of the two fingerprints,"}, {"time": 394538, "text": "which actually corresponds to Katie."}, {"time": 397368, "text": "And they've been able to say so"}, {"time": 398885, "text": "because they've compared
the two separate images"}, {"time": 401512, "text": "with one taken posthumously from Katie."}, {"time": 404902, "text": "So now, we can concentrate
on one fingerprint only --"}, {"time": 410119, "text": "that of the killer's."}, {"time": 412477, "text": "So then, step two ..."}, {"time": 414968, "text": "where are these three
molecules that I've seen?"}, {"time": 418250, "text": "Well, let's interrogate the software --
show me where they are."}, {"time": 421522, "text": "And by doing this,"}, {"time": 423206, "text": "only portions of the image
of the killer's fingerprint show up."}, {"time": 429511, "text": "In other words,"}, {"time": 430939, "text": "those substances are only present
in the killer's print."}, {"time": 437120, "text": "So now our molecular findings
start matching very nicely"}, {"time": 442364, "text": "the police intelligence about Thomson,"}, {"time": 445089, "text": "should that fingerprint belong to him."}, {"time": 448650, "text": "But the reality is that that print
is still not good enough"}, {"time": 452321, "text": "to make an identification."}, {"time": 454393, "text": "Step three:"}, {"time": 455818, "text": "since we can generate hundreds of images
of the same fingerprint,"}, {"time": 462506, "text": "why don't we superimpose them,"}, {"time": 465453, "text": "and by doing so,"}, {"time": 466630, "text": "try to improve the rich pattern
of continuity and clarity?"}, {"time": 470067, "text": "That's the result."}, {"time": 472303, "text": "Striking."}, {"time": 473729, "text": "We now have a very clear image
of the fingerprint"}, {"time": 477695, "text": "and the police can run it
through the database."}, {"time": 480469, "text": "The match comes out to Thomson."}, {"time": 483839, "text": "Thomson is our killer."}, {"time": 485364, "text": "(Applause)"}, {"time": 489356, "text": "Katie, the suspects and the circumstances
of the crime aren't real,"}, {"time": 496127, "text": "but the story contains elements"}, {"time": 499700, "text": "of the real police casework
we've been confronted with,"}, {"time": 504071, "text": "and is a composite of the intelligence
that we can provide --"}, {"time": 507261, "text": "that we have been able
to provide the police."}, {"time": 511089, "text": "And I'm really, really thrilled
that after nine years of intense research,"}, {"time": 515751, "text": "as of 2017,"}, {"time": 517736, "text": "we are able to contribute
to police investigations."}, {"time": 521462, "text": "Mine is no longer a dream;"}, {"time": 524110, "text": "it's a goal."}, {"time": 525958, "text": "We're going to do this wider and wider,"}, {"time": 528806, "text": "bigger and bigger,"}, {"time": 530127, "text": "and we're going to know
more about the suspect,"}, {"time": 533232, "text": "and we're going to build an identikit."}, {"time": 536121, "text": "I believe this is also a new era
for criminal profiling."}, {"time": 540884, "text": "The work of the criminologist"}, {"time": 542298, "text": "draws on the expert recognition
of behavioral patterns"}, {"time": 546407, "text": "that have been observed before
to belong to a certain type,"}, {"time": 550056, "text": "to a certain profile."}, {"time": 551869, "text": "As opposed to this expert
but subjective evaluation,"}, {"time": 556340, "text": "we're trying to do the same thing,"}, {"time": 558695, "text": "but from the molecular makeup
of the fingerprint,"}, {"time": 562283, "text": "and the two can work together."}, {"time": 564812, "text": "I did say that molecules are storytellers,"}, {"time": 567702, "text": "so information on your health,"}, {"time": 570265, "text": "your actions, your lifestyle,
your routines,"}, {"time": 574446, "text": "they're all there,"}, {"time": 576258, "text": "accessible in a fingerprint."}, {"time": 579403, "text": "And molecules are
the storytellers of our secrets"}, {"time": 584813, "text": "in just a touch."}, {"time": 586706, "text": "Thank you."}, {"time": 587881, "text": "(Audience) Wow."}, {"time": 589063, "text": "(Applause)"}]
